180b7(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos nyid la gnas par mi bgyi'o// tshor ba dang / chos kyi dbyings la gnas par mi bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhes na/ bcom
180b8(nyi khri): ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar chos dbyings chos kyi dbyings kyis stong ste/ chos kyi dbyings kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/
181a1(nyi khri): chos kyi dbyings las gud na yang stob nying ma mchis na/ rgyas kyi dbyings nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// bcom
181a2(nyi khri): ldan 'das rnam grangs ngas na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos kyi dbyings la
181a3(nyi khri): par mi bgyi'o// chos skyon med pa nyid la gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de tso'i slang du zhen/ bcom ldan 'das che ni 'di ltar chos ston med pa nyid chos ston
181a4(nyi khri): med pa nyid kyis stong ste/ chos skyon med pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang / chos skyon med pa nyid ma lags/ chos sbyor med pa nyid las gud na
181a5(nyi khri): yang stod pa nyid ma mchis te/ chos sgron med pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang chos sbyini med pa zhing nga // bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des ma/
181a6(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la stong pa'i tshe/ chos ston meng pa nyid la gnas par mi brgya
181a7(nyi khri): yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i srad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar yang dag pa'i mtha' yang dag pa'i mtha' spongs/
181a8(nyi khri): yang dag pa'i mtha'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa yang dag pa'i mtha' ma lags/ yang dag pa'i mtha' las gra na yang spang bzhing ma mchis te/ yang
181b1(nyi khri): dag pa'i mtha' nyid kyang stong pa ches kyang yang dag pa'i mam// bcom ldan 'das rnam thangs ngas na/ byang chubasams dpa' sems
181b2(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa'i mtha' mal gnas par mi bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa'
181b3(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnas pa'i mi bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das gal
181b4(nyi khri): te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas bdag nyid tu bgyi ba dang
181b5(nyi khri): bdag gis pa la gnas pa'i yid kyis gzugs gzugs la gnas/ de gzugs mngon par du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
181b6(nyi khri): pa la mi spyod do// gal te tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa la gnas na/ de rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du bgyi ba
181b7(nyi khri): laspyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de tso'i slad du zhe na/ mngon par bgyi ba la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' ches
181b8(nyi khri): mos ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su zin par mi 'gyur/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i/ rnal 'byor la snyoms par 'jug par
182a1(nyi khri): 'gyur te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/ yongs sa rdzogs par mabyung bar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nying du 'byung bar ma 'gyur ro// bcom ldan
182a2(nyi khri): 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol daphyin pa la stong pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas bdag tu brgya ba dang / bdag gir
182a3(nyi khri): bal gnas pa'i yid kyis yang dag pa'i mdza' ba gnas na/ ri yang dag pa'i mdza'i mdzod du bgyi ba la myong bya/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi myong // tsho'i slang du
182a4(nyi khri): / mngon par 'dubagyi ba la spyong pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni/ shes rab kyi la tu phyin pa yongs su dzin pa la mi 'gyur/ shes rab kyi
182a5(nyi khri): pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor la snyoms par 'jug par mi 'gyur te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par ma byung bar rnam par thams cad mkhyen pa
182a6(nyi khri): nying du 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i slang du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar gzugs ni yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pas/ gzugs kyi yongs su
182a7(nyi khri): babazang babang 'gas pa de yang/ byung ba'i sla lam lams/ tsha ba dang / 'phral sa 'dubyungs rnam pags pam pa
182a8(nyi khri): bam mchis paste/ rnam par gas pa'i yangs sa bzung sa ma mchis pagang mags pa mang/ rang sa gyis spong ba'i mang du ma pa shes pa ma las
182b1(nyi khri): dag pa'i mtha'i bar du yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa ste/ yang dag pa'i mtha'i yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de yang rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i srang
182b2(nyi khri): du/ yang dag pa'i mtha'i ma lags te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de yang rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i slad du/ yang dag pa'i mtho'i ma lags te/ yongs su
182b3(nyi khri): bzung ba ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ de ltar chos thams cad
182b4(nyi khri): rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid yongs su brtag par bgyi ste/ ci nas kyang gang la yang yid rnam par mi rgyu ba de ltar yongs su brtag par mi bgyi'o// bcom ldan
182b5(nyi khri): 'das 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor chos thams cad ma bzung ba zhes bgyi ba ste/ rgya chel phul du
182b6(nyi khri): bgyi ba/ tshad ma mchis pa tshad ma mchis par nges pa/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis mi 'grogs shing de dag dang thun mong ma lags pa ste/
182b7(nyi khri): nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor de la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur te/ rnam pa thams cad
182b8(nyi khri): mkhyen pa nyid de yang / nang stong pa nyid dang phyir stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong
183a1(nyi khri): pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med dang / dor ba mad
183a2(nyi khri): bstong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gyi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po
183a3(nyi khri): med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi slad du yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ de ni
183a4(nyi khri): mtshan mas brjod pa ma lags pa ste/ de ni 'di ltar mtshan ma khas nyon mongs pa 'byung ste/ mtshar ma de dag gang zhen/ gzugs ni mtshan ma'o// tshor ba ni mtshan
183a5(nyi khri): ma'o// 'du shes ni mtshan ma'o// 'du byed ni mtshan ma'o// rnam par shes pa ni mtshan ma'o// mig ni mtshan ma'o// rna ba dang sna dang lce dang lus dang yid ni
183a6(nyi khri): mtshan ma'o// gzugs ni mtshan ma'o// sa dang ni nga ro dang ga bya nga chos ni mtshan ma'o// mig gi rnam par shes pa ni mtshan ma'o// rna ba'i rnam par
183a7(nyi khri): ba dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus dz+nyArnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni mtshan ma'o// mas gi 'dus kyi gas
183a8(nyi khri): ni mtshan ma'o// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus mirig pa dang / lde'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te ga pa ni mtshan
183b1(nyi khri): ma'o// mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni mtshan ma'o// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshar
183b2(nyi khri): ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni mtshan
183b3(nyi khri): ma'o// sa'i khams ni mtshan ma'o// chu'i khams ni mtshan ma'o// me'i khams ni mtshan ma'o// rlung gi khams dang / nam mkha'i khams dang / rnam par shes pa'i kham
183b4(nyi khri): ni mtshan ma'o// ma rig pa mtshan ma'o// 'du byed ni mtshan ma'o// rnam par shes pa dang / ming dang gzugs dang / skye mched drug dang / reg pa dang / tshor ba dang /
183b5(nyi khri): sred pa dang / len pa dang / srid pa dang / skye ba dang / rga shi ni mtshan ma'o// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni mtshan ma'o// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mtshan
183b6(nyi khri): ma'o// bzod pa'i pha tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mtshan
183b7(nyi khri): ma'o// nang stong pa nyid ni mtshan ma'o// phyi stong pa nyid ni mtshan ma'o// phyi nang stong pa nyid ni mtshan ma'o// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni mtshan ma'o//
183b8(nyi khri): dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni mtshan ma'o// yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang/
184a1(nyi khri): chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams
184a2(nyi khri): dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa gu
184a3(nyi khri): stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / gzugs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /
184a4(nyi khri): 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni mtshan ma'o// yi ge rnams ni mtshan ma'o// gcig tu badz+rad
184a5(nyi khri): ba mtshan ma'o// gnyis su brjod pa ni mtshan ma'o// Tha dad du brjod pa ni mtshan ma'o// de ni tsan mongs pa zhes bgyi ba'o// gal te mtshan bzung ba zhig lags nan
184a6(nyi khri): kun tu rgyu 'greng ba can yang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes 'dil dad pa thob par mi gyur to// dad pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
184a7(nyi khri): med ches pa dang / rtog pa dang mos pa dang / chen pa dang sems pa dang / 'jal ba dang / dpyod pa sde dang yang mtshan ma'i tshul du ma lags/ mtshan ma mchis pa'i
184a8(nyi khri): tshus 'a sa sa mam sa mam pas mang du rgya la ma
184b1(nyi khri): phreng ba can des kyang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes 'di la mos par gyur nas/ dad pa'i rjes su 'brang bas 'i che ba'i ye shes kyis zhugs te/ kun de lngar zhugs
184b2(nyi khri): gzugs yongs su ma bzung / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa yongs su ma bzung ngo // de ni 'di ltar des rang gi mtshan nyid kyis spong
184b3(nyi khri): pa'i chos thams cad la yongs su 'dzin la ma dmigs te/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar nges ye shes de rtogs pa dang / thob par brgyad bgyi ba'i tshul gyis nang du yang dag par
184b4(nyi khri): rjes su mthong / ye shes de rtogs pa dang / thob par bgyi ba'i tshul gyis phyin rol tu pa yang dag par rjes ma mthong / ye shes de rtogs pa dang thob par bgyi ba'i tshul gyis phyi
184b5(nyi khri): nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / ye shes de rtogs pa dang / thob par bgyi ba'i tshul gyis de las gzhan du yang / yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo // de ci'i slad
184b6(nyi khri): du zhe na/ 'di ltar des chos gang gis rtogs par bgyi ba dang / gang rtogs par bgyi ba dang / gang rtogs par bgyi ba de lta bu'i chos yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ste/
184b7(nyi khri): des ye shes gzugs kyi nang du yang dag par rjes su mthong / me shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / ye shes
184b8(nyi khri): gzugs kyi pha rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / ye shes de tsher ba dang / rnam par shes pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / ye shes nges
184b9(nyi khri): du shes dang / 'du byed dang /
185a1(nyi khri): 'du shes dang /
185a2(nyi khri): gzugs kyi phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / migs dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ma lags pa gzhan yang dag par rjes su ma
185a3(nyi khri): mthong ngo // ye shes de yang dag pa'i rjes su mtha'i bar gyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / ye shes de yang dag pa'i mtha'i phyi rol tu phyi yang dag par rjes sum
185a4(nyi khri): mthong / ye shes de yang dag pa'i phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / ye shes yang dag pa'i mtha'i ma lags pa gzhan du yang dag par rjes su mthong ngo // rnamatha
185a5(nyi khri): 'di la kun tu rgyu ba 'phreng ba can mos par gyur nas dad pa'i rjes su 'brang bas chos nyid tshad mar bgyis te/ chos thams cad mi dmigs pa'i slad du rnam pa
185a6(nyi khri): cang mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes la zhugs par gyur te/ de de ltar mos par gyur nas/ des chos gang yang tshad ma mchis pa dang / yid la bgyi ba ma mchis pa'i
185a7(nyi khri): slad du yongs su bzung ba ma mchis/ gtang du ma mchis pa'i slad du yongs su bzung bar bgyi ba 'am/ btang bar bgyi ba de lta bu'i chos ngas ma dmig+sa
185a8(nyi khri): chos thams cad la rnam sems ma mchis pa'i slad du yor mya ngan las 'das pas kyang rlom sems su 'gyur ba ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das de ltar ga
185a9(nyi khri): rnams ca yongs su 'jung ba ma mchis pa'i srang du gzugs sangs su mi 'dzin pa dang / tshor ba ngas 'dushes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa 'angs
185b1(nyi khri): su ma 'dzin pa dang / chos thams cad yangs su ma bzung ba ma mchis pa'i srang du ste mchod dang / khams dang chen cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang / pha rol tu
185b2(nyi khri): pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med
185b3(nyi khri): pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa rnams dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / spong
185b4(nyi khri): pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang /
185b5(nyi khri): stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dang / mngon par shes pa bgyi ba ma mchis dang /
185b6(nyi khri): de bzhin gshegs pa nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' yongs su mi 'dzin
185b7(nyi khri): pa 'di ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// 'on kyang smon lam yongs su ma rdzogs kyi bar
185b8(nyi khri): drim der yongasas mya ngan las ma 'das te/ dran pa sa bar gzhag pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs mang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi nang pa ras dbang bad/
186a1(nyi khri): dang / skabs dpa byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su ma rdzogs/
186a2(nyi khri): 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi pa dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam
186a3(nyi khri): par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms pa'i'ajig pa dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shesapa
186a4(nyi khri): rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzugs kyi sgo rnam dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig
186a5(nyi khri): pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su ma rdzogs par bar mdor yongs su mya ngan las mi 'anga'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar smon lam
186a6(nyi khri): rnams ni smon lam ma lags/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni dran pa che bar gzhag pa rnams ma lags/ yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang
186a7(nyi khri): pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / spobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden
186a8(nyi khri): pa rnams dang / bsam pacan rnams dang / yang meng pa rnams dpa / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'ag pa rnams dpa rnam papa rab brgyad dpa #
186b1(nyi khri): gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang /
186b2(nyi khri): ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig
186b3(nyi khri): pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa ma lags te/ de dag ni chos kyang ma lags/ chos ma lags pa yang ma lags/ rnam bcom ldan 'das de
186b4(nyi khri): ltar chos thams cad yongs su ma bzung ba'i slad du gzugs yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes
186b5(nyi khri): pa yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / chos thams cad yongs su ma zung ba dang slad du/ yang dag pa'i mthe'i bar du yongs su 'dzin pa 'di ni byang chub sem/
186b6(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
186b7(nyi khri): rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam par 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni gang gi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni ci zhig/
186b8(nyi khri): phyir zhe na/ de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes yongs su brtag par bgyi ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
187a1(nyi khri): phyin pa la stod pa'i tshe/ gal te 'di ltar chos gang yod pa ma yin zhing mi dmigs pa'i ye shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin nam myong na/ shes
187a2(nyi khri): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor chos gang rnam
187a3(nyi khri): med cing mi dmigs pa'i yin/ rab 'byor gyis sbas pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong
187a4(nyi khri): pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /
187a5(nyi khri): thog ma da tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang /
187a6(nyi khri): mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid spong pa nyid kyi phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
187a7(nyi khri): med cing mi dmigs so// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu
187a8(nyi khri): kyipha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu med cing mi dmigs so// chengang ldan pa zhar ma ti'i bu/ nang spong ba nyid dang/ phyi stong sa nyid dang / byin grang ma ci/
187b1(nyi khri): dang / stong pa stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / maH
187b2(nyi khri): las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad
187b3(nyi khri): stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos pa
187b4(nyi khri): med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ gzugs med cing mi dmigs shing / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa med cing mi
187b5(nyi khri): dmigs so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang /
187b6(nyi khri): don dam pa stong nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid
187b7(nyi khri): dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid
187b8(nyi khri): mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa
188a1(nyi khri): ning kyi phyir/ skye mched rnams dang / khams rnams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba med cing mi dmigs so// tshe dang ldan pa shwa ra dwa ti'i bun
188a2(nyi khri): pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnams med cing mi dmigs so// byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun med
188a3(nyi khri): cing mi dmigs so// 'phags pa'i 'dzin pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam
188a4(nyi khri): par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang /
188a5(nyi khri): ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /
188a6(nyi khri): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad med cing mi dmigs so// nang stong pa dang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras
188a7(nyi khri): bu medan cing mi dmig so// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub dang / lam gyi rnam par shes
188a8(nyi khri): panyid dang / rnam pa rnams cad mtshan pa ning mang bya ma rigs sa// cha nga ba nyid sa dngos po med pa'i rib nyid sdong po tshad kyi ma gyi phyir de bzhin
188b1(nyi khri): nyid med cing mi dmigs so// chos nyid dang chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / skyon chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' med cing ma
188b2(nyi khri): dmigs so// nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir gyi phyir/ rgyun tu zhugs pa med cing mi dmigs so// lan cig phyir 'ong
188b3(nyi khri): ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / sangs rgyas kyang med cing mi dmigs so// tshe dang ldan
188b4(nyi khri): pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu nang stong pa nyid dmigs su med cing mi dmigs so// phyi stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir phyir stong pa nyid med cing mi dmigs so//
188b5(nyi khri): phyi nang stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir phyi nang stong pa nyid med cing mi dmigs so// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du dmigs phyi su med pa'i
188b6(nyi khri): phyir dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid med cing mi dmigs so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// shes
188b7(nyi khri): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te de ltar rtag cig sems pa dang / de ltar rtog cing sems pa'i tshe/ sems bzhum par med cing yongs su
188b8(nyi khri): zhum pa med pa la mi 'jigs mi sdang skrag par mi 'gyur na/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthal bar shes par bya'o//
189a1(nyi khri): smras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral bar
189a2(nyi khri): shes par bya/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzugs ni gzugs kyi rang bzhin dang / bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems
189a3(nyi khri): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i rmi/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu zhes so// tshor ba ni tshor ba'i rang bzhin dang bral ba/
189a4(nyi khri): 'du shes ni 'du shes kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba/ 'du byed mi 'du byed kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba/ rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin dang bral
189a5(nyi khri): ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// tshe dang
189a6(nyi khri): ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba ni dzin cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i rang bzhin dang bral po/ sbyin pa'i pharol
189a7(nyi khri): phyin pa sbyin pa rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba/ rdul khams kyi rol tu phyin pa dang / bzang pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus rgya
189a8(nyi khri): pa nga pa sa la sa ma gas ba kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i nga pom dang bral ba// ma
189b1(nyi khri): nang stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar ni dngos po med pa mang bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang ba tshan dang tham
189b2(nyi khri): dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan
189b3(nyi khri): lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa dang /
189b4(nyi khri): gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dgu dang / stong pa
189b5(nyi khri): dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang //
189b6(nyi khri): mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad kyi
189b7(nyi khri): rang bzhin dang bral ba/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang /
189b8(nyi khri): rang byang chub dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar mi rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ring bzhin dang bral ba/ de bzhin nyid ni de bzhin ci /
190a1(nyi khri): rang bzhin dang bral ba/ ma sbyor pa de bzhin nyid dang / gzhanam yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / ma tshad dang / chos dbyangs dang / rgyas gams
190a2(nyi khri): nying dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang yang dag pa'i mtha' ni yang dag pa'i mtha'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
190a3(nyi khri): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de'i phyir// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa
190a4(nyi khri): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / ma bral bar shes par bya'o// smras pa tshe dang ldan par rab 'byor gzugs kyi rang bzhin ji lta bu tshor ba dang 'du shes
190a5(nyi khri): dang 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin ji lta bu/ skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i rang bzhin dzaM lta bu/ yang dag pa
190a6(nyi khri): mtha' bar gyi rang bzhin ji lta bu/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzugs kyi rang bzhini ni dngos po med pa'o// tshor ba dang / 'dra
190a7(nyi khri): shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i rang ba nin+d+ha
190a8(nyi khri): ngangs pa mang pa'o// yang dag pa mas rang ba ni mdang ngas tha med pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa yang duma'i burnam grangs nges na 'di ltar gzugs kyi rang bam
190b1(nyi khri): pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa rang bzhin med pa dang / skye mched rnams skye mched rnams kyi rang bzhin med pa dang //
190b2(nyi khri): khams rnams la khams kyi rang bzhin med pa dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba rnams la rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i rang bzhin med pa dang / yang
190b3(nyi khri): dag pa'i mtha'a'i bar la yang dag pa'i mtha' ring bzhin med par shes par bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang gzugs la gzugs
190b4(nyi khri): kyi mtshan nyid med do// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid med do// skye mched rnams la skye mched kyi mtshan nyid med
190b5(nyi khri): do/ khams rnams la khams kyi mtshan nyid med do// rten cing 'brel par 'khyang ba'i mtshan nyid med do// yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar du yang dag pa'i
190b6(nyi khri): mtha' mtshan nyid med do// mtshan nyid la yang mtshan nyid kyi rang bzhin med do// mtshan nyid kyi rang bzhin la yang mtshan nyid kyi rang bzhin med do//
190b7(nyi khri): smras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang la bslab par 'di la slob pa de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du
190b8(nyi khri): 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de de bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang sla ba
191a1(nyi khri): 'di la slob pa 'di ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ni
191a2(nyi khri): 'di ltar chos thams cad ma skyes ma byung ba'i phyir/ smras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byoraji ltar na chos thams cad ma skyes ma byung ba yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/
191a3(nyi khri): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzugs gzugs kyis ste/ de la skye ba yang mi dmigaso// / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'dra byed dang / rnam par shes pa la rnam par shes
191a4(nyi khri): pas stong ste/ de la skye ba yang mi dmigs 'byung ba yang mi dmigs so// yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar du yang dag pa'i mthas stong ste/ de la skye ba yang mi dmigs 'byung
191a5(nyi khri): ba yang mi dmigs so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shos rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni/ rnam pa thams cad
191a6(nyi khri): mkhyen pa nyid dang nye ba yin te/ de lta ji ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nye bar gyur pa de lta de ltar lus yongs su dag pa dang / ngag yong su dag pa dang / sems
191a7(nyi khri): yongasu dag pa dang / mtshan ma yongs su dag par 'thob par 'gyur ro// de ji lta ji ltar lus yongs su dag pa dang / ngag yongs su dag pa dang / sems yongs su dag pad
191a8(nyi khri): mtshan ma yongs su dag pa thob par 'gyur ba de la/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de yang 'dod chags dang ldan pa'i sems mi skyed ngo // ni sdang dang
191b1(nyi khri): ldan pa dang / gti mug dang ldan pa dang / nga rgyal dang ldan pa dang / g.yo sgyu dang ldan pa dang / ser sna dang ldan pa dang / srid pa dang ldan pa dang / lta ba dang ldan pa ni
191b2(nyi khri): sems mi skyed do// de 'dod chags kyi sems kyi sems mi skyed cing / zhe sdang dang gti mug dang / nga rgyal dang g.yo sgyu dang / phrag dog dang ser sna dang / sred pa dang /
191b3(nyi khri): lta ba dang / ldan pa'i sems mi skyed pas/ nam yang ma'i mngal du skye bar mi 'gyur te/ ther zug rtag par rdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro// sems can yong su smin
191b4(nyi khri): par bya ba'i don ma gtogs par nam yang ngan song rnamasu skye bar mi 'gyur te/ zer zug rtog par rdzus te skye bor 'gyur ro// sems can yongs su smin par
191b5(nyi khri): bya ba'i don ma gtogs par nam yang ngan song rnams su skye bar mi 'gyur ro// de sems can yongasu smin par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag
191b6(nyi khri): par byed cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro ste/ nam bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas
191b7(nyi khri): par ma gyur gyi bar du/ nam yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang bral bar mi 'gyur ro// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sem
191b8(nyi khri): dpa' chen po yon tan dang / legs pa 'di dag 'thob par 'dod pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la brtson 'grus mi btang bar spyad par bya ste/
192a1(nyi khri): tshe dang ldan pa shA tsa'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'an zags rab tu pa ral tu phyir pa la dris sbyang ba ni rnam pa thams na
192a2(nyi khri): bad du bar gyur pa yin no// shes rab kyi rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi sh+'ulnga las// let+pal po// den tsho nga ldan pa ba'agyur
192a3(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
192a4(nyi khri): spyod pa'o tshe/ tha bas mi mkhas pas gzugs la spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// gal te tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa la
192a5(nyi khri): spyod na mtshan ma la spyod ngo // gal te gzugs rtag ces bgyi bar spyong na mtshan ma la spyong ngo // gal te tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par
192a6(nyi khri): shes pa rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// gal te gzugs mi rtag ces bgyi bar stong na mtshan ma la snang ngo // gal te tshor ba dang / 'du
192a7(nyi khri): shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa mi d+ha ga ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la snang ngo // gal te gzugs bdo nas bgyi bar snang na mdzan la spya
192a8(nyi khri): po tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa bode zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod // gal te gzugs sdug bsngal zhes ba
192b1(nyi khri): bar spyod na mtshar ma la spyod ngo // tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal ba zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//
192b2(nyi khri): te gzugs med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// tshor ba dang 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la sbyad
192b3(nyi khri): do gal te gzugs bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa bdag med ces bgyi ba
192b4(nyi khri): spyod na mtshan ma la spyong ngo // gal te gzugs zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod mtshan ma la spyod do// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ni
192b5(nyi khri): zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod na mtshan ma la spyod ngo // gal te gzugs mo zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod ngo // tsher ba dang / 'du shes
192b6(nyi khri): dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod // gal te gzugs dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la sbyang
192b7(nyi khri): tshor ba dang // 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// gal te gzugs mo dben zhes bgyi bar
192b8(nyi khri): mtshan ma la spyod // tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa mang ben zhes bgyi bar spyong na mtshan ma la spyod // bcom ldan 'das
193a1(nyi khri): de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' na po shes rab kyi rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa bas ma khas pas skye mched dang / khams
193a2(nyi khri): rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang / 'phags pa
193a3(nyi khri): bden pa dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa rnams dang /
193a4(nyi khri): mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge/
193a5(nyi khri): 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang //
193a6(nyi khri): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres bco brgyad rtag pa dang / mi rtag pa dang / bde ba dang sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag dang bdag med pa dang / zhi ba dang / mazhi
193a7(nyi khri): dang dben pa dang / ming ben pa zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
193a8(nyi khri): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'di ltar du bdag ga mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spong ngo // zhes bgyi bar spyod na dmigs pa la spyod pa ste/ byang
193b1(nyi khri): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di snyam du gang de la
193b2(nyi khri): spyod pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod ngo // de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom mo zhes par
193b3(nyi khri): spyod na mtshan ma nyid la spyod pa ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tha bas mi mkhas par rig par bgyi'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa
193b4(nyi khri): shA ra dwa ti'i bus/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thib
193b5(nyi khri): mi mkhas pa ji ltar rig par bya ba yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA rA dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/
193b6(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob na/ de gzugs la mos shing 'du shes te byon
193b7(nyi khri): gyis rlobs pas glazugs mngon par 'dun ba la spyod de/ de na bu dang / rga nga ngan po dang / 'chi ba dang / ma na nga/ skyes gas 'dron pa dang /
193b8(nyi khri): bsal ba dang / yong mo ba 'khrul pa la sa yongs su ma ma/ sdug pasal chen po las meng mi'i grol ba brji // rnam pa
194a1(nyi khri): 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa lams shing 'dushes te byin gyis rlo bar/ de rnam par shes pa la mos shing 'du shes
194a2(nyi khri): te byin gyis rlob pas rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du bya bstod de/ der skye ba dngan pa dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don padang
194a3(nyi khri): sdug bsngal ba dang / yad mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa las yongs su mi grol/ sdug bsngal chen po las yongs su mi 'grol bar brjod do// gal te
194a4(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ mig la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis ts+tsha ba/ rna ba dang sa
194a5(nyi khri): dang lho dang / lus dang yid la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlo ba/ gzugs la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob/ sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg du
194a6(nyi khri): chos la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis ts+tsha ba/ mig gi rnam par shes pa la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlo ba/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sgyu
194a7(nyi khri): rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlong
194a8(nyi khri): mig gi'i 'dus te reg pa la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob/ rna ba'i 'du shes te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang /
194b1(nyi khri): lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la mos na
194b2(nyi khri): 'du shes te byin gyis rlob/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
194b3(nyi khri): gyis tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / yid kyis 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis
194b4(nyi khri): rlob/ ma rig pa'i mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob/ 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang / ming dang gzugs dang / skye mched drug dang / reg pa
194b5(nyi khri): dang / tshor ba dang / sred pa dang / len pa dang / srid pa dang / skye ba dang / rga shi la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob/ pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang /
194b6(nyi khri): stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa
194b7(nyi khri): rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
194b8(nyi khri): dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / mig lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /
195a1(nyi khri): / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa ban dang / sas yang dag par rig pa ldan /
195a2(nyi khri): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob na/ de sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyang la mos shing 'du shes
195a3(nyi khri): te byin gyis rlob pas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad mngon par 'du bya ba la spyod ngo // de ni skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang /
195a4(nyi khri): mya ngan dang smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yang mo bde ba dang / 'khrug pa las yongasu mi grol/ sdug bsngal chen po las yongs su ma
195a5(nyi khri): bgrol bar brjod do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyis
195a6(nyi khri): mngon du bya ba'i skal pa med na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya ba lta ji smos te/ de ni gnas med do// tshe dang ldan
195a7(nyi khri): pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod na/ thabs mi mkhas pas shes par byen
195a8(nyi khri): smras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ji ltar spyod na thabs mkhas par shes
195b1(nyi khri): par bya/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cig
195b2(nyi khri): gzugs la ma spyod/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa la yang mi spyod/ gzugs kyi mtshan ma la mi spyod/ tshor ba dang / 'du she
195b3(nyi khri): 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i mtshan ma la mi sbyong / gzugs ces bya bar mi spyod/ gzugs ma rtag ces bya ba dang / gzugs bde zhes bya ba dang /
195b4(nyi khri): gzugs sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / gzugs bdag ces bya ba dang / gzugs bdag med ces bya ba dang / gzugs zhi zhes bya ba dang / gzugs ma zhi
195b5(nyi khri): zhes bya ba dang / gzugs stong zhes bya ba dang / gzugs mo stong zhes bya ba dang / gzugs mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / gzugs mtshan ma med ces bya ba
195b6(nyi khri): dang / gzug dber zhes bya ba dang / gzugs ma ber zhes bya bar mo spyod pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya
195b7(nyi khri): mi skyong mi rtag ces bya ba dang / bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba/ bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya ba dang / stob ma
195b8(nyi khri): bya ba dang / mo stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / dben pa zhes bya ba dang /
196a1(nyi khri): ming ben zhes bya bar spyod pa'i che/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thobs mkhas par shes par bya'o// de ci'i phyir
196a2(nyi khri): zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzugs kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang gzugs ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na yang gzugs med/
196a3(nyi khri): gzugs las gud na yang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang gzugs/ gzugs nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed
196a4(nyi khri): dang / rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang rnam par shes pa ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na yang rnam par shes pa med/ rnam par shes pa
196a5(nyi khri): med de/ stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa/ rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid ngo // skye mched dang khams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang /
196a6(nyi khri): pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang /
196a7(nyi khri): bsam ga rnams dang / chad med pa rnams dang / gzugs meng pa po snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par bar pa rnams pa
196a8(nyi khri): mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa rnams dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon pa
196b1(nyi khri): sas rgyas ma 'dres bra brgyad kyi song ba'i la yang yi 'am ma yin/ thom ba nyid las kyang pamam ma
196b2(nyi khri): shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /
196b3(nyi khri): so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams las gud na yang stong pa nyid med de/
196b4(nyi khri): stong pa nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang stong pa nyid ngo // tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa'
196b5(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni/ kya sa kya kyi kyi na tu
196b6(nyi khri): phyin pa skyong phragar+b+ha shUlA pa// bem po bcu gtsag pa'o// me du ldan pa rang te 'bru byung chub sems dpa sems du
196b7(nyi khri): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ngel skyed pa tshe blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'drang rgya ba'i sel ba med /
196b8(nyi khri): 'tshonas rab kyipo kyi rol tu byon pa la snod kyang sbeng do// zhes bya ba mi dmigs so// rma sto zhes bya bar mi dmigs// spyod byung
196b9(nyi khri): lam stod kyang mo skyed ces bye ba mo mig so// spyod pa yang ma yin mo spong pa yang ma yin no// zhes bya ba mi dmigs so// smras pa tsha
197a1(nyi khri): ldan par rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' rkyen po nas rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la smad pa'i
197a2(nyi khri): spyod ces bya bar yang mi dmigs/ mau spyod ces bya bar yang mi dmigs/ spyod kyang spyod la mi spyod kyang mi spyod ces bya bar mi dmigs/ spyod pa yang ma
197a3(nyi khri): smin mi spyod pa yang ma yin zhes bya bar mi dmigs pa yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bung ni 'di ltar/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
197a4(nyi khri): byin pa'i rang bzhin mi dmigs pa'i phyir te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin te/ tshe dang ldan pa
197a5(nyi khri): shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs de na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ spyod do zhes bya bar yang ma
197a6(nyi khri): dmigs so// mi spyod ces bya bar yang mi dmigs/ spyod kyang spyod la mi spyod kyang mi spyong zhes bya bar mi dmigs so// spyod pa yang ma yin mi spyod pa
197a7(nyi khri): yang ma yin no// zhes bya bar ming migs so// 'phyir nan/ 'di ltar des chos thams cad dngos po meng pa'i rang bzhin du 'ang du rgyud cing ma blangs pa
197a8(nyi khri): phyir te/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi cing 'dzimachos thams cad skye ba med pa zhes bya bskye ba med pa zhes bya bas/ rgya che
197b1(nyi khri): mchog tu bya ba tshad med pa des/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis mi 'phrogs pa ste/ ting nge 'dzin des rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems
197b2(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya'o// smras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ting nge 'dzin/
197b3(nyi khri): 'di 'ba' shig gis rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dgra par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par
197b4(nyi khri): 'tshang brgya'o// 'on tam de lta bu'i ti nge 'dzin gzhan pa dag kyang yod / ra ba 'i khyer gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu ting nge 'dzin gzham
197b5(nyi khri): dag la rnam par spyod pas kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs
197b6(nyi khri): par 'tshang rgya ba yod do// smras pa che dang ldan pa rab 'byor ting nge 'dzin gzhan gang dag gis rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
197b7(nyi khri): chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa
197b8(nyi khri): radwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis ting nge 'dzin dpa' bar 'gro ba'i zhes bya ba yod de/ ting nge 'dzin nges rnam par spyod pa'i
198a1(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa pyod du blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub du mngon par rdzogs par 'chang na/
198a2(nyi khri): de bzhin du rin po cher pyaN+ya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod // seng ge rnam par brtse ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzid yid ngo do// zla ba bzang po zhes bya ba'i tong
198a3(nyi khri): 'dzin yod do/ zla ba'i rgyal mtshan dpa' zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yang ngo // chos thams cad shin tu 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yong ngo // chos
198a4(nyi khri): thams cad kyi phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// s+thi gtsug rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yongs su chos kyi dbyings su nges pa zhes bya ba
198a5(nyi khri): ting nge 'dzin yod do// nges pa'i rgyal mtshan dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// chos thams cad la
198a6(nyi khri): 'jug pa'i phyag rgya zhes ting nge 'dzin yod do// ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal por rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// 'od zer rab tu bgyid pa
198a7(nyi khri): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// dpung rnams par bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yang // yang dag par 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
198a8(nyi khri): yod do// nges pa'i tshig la gdon mi za bar 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// tshig bla dgas la yang dag par 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge
198b1(nyi khri): 'dzin yadzad// phyogs rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yadang // phyag tu yongs su 'byin pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin pa dang // nyam pa med pa zhes
198b2(nyi khri): bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// chos thams cad yang dag par 'du ba rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// nam mkha' rgyas par 'gengs pa zhes
198b3(nyi khri): bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// rgyal mtshan rtse mo'i dpung rgyal ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// dbang
198b4(nyi khri): po'i dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// rgyun gyi rjes su song ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// seng ge rnam par 'gyings pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge
198b5(nyi khri): 'dzin yod do// spel gzhi zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// nyon mongs pa spong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// rnam par spong ba zhes bya ba'i
198b6(nyi khri): ting nge 'dzin yod do/ tshol ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// gnas la rten pa med zer zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// sems med pa
198b7(nyi khri): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// dri ma med pa'i sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// 'od mtha' yas shes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do//
198b8(nyi khri): 'odi byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yong ngo // dag pa dam pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ya /
199a1(nyi khri): 'od dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// dga' ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin mong ngo // klog gi sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
199a2(nyi khri): yod do// zad mi shes pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// mi 'phams pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// gzi brjid yod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
199a3(nyi khri): yod do// zad pa dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// mi g.yo ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// 'jigs pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod
199a4(nyi khri): / nyi ma'i sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// zla ba dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// shes rab sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin mang
199a5(nyi khri): snang ba gsol ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// smyung ba byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yong ngo // bya ba byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do//
199a6(nyi khri): ye shes dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// rdo rje lta bu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// sems gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// kun
199a7(nyi khri): tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// rin chen mtha' zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// chos ngam
199a8(nyi khri): pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yong ngo // chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin mngo // dgas pa spong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzim
199a9(nyi khri): 'dzin yod do// phyogs rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// phyag rgya yongs su 'dzin pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// nyam pa med pa zhes
199a10(nyi khri): bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// chos thams cad yang dag par 'du ba rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// nam mkha' rgyas par 'gengs pa zhes
199a11(nyi khri): bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// rgyal mtshan rtse mo'i dpung rgyal ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yong ngo // dab
199a12(nyi khri): pa'i dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// rgyun gyi rjes su song ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// seng ge rnam par 'gyings pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge
199a13(nyi khri): 'dzin yod do// spel gzhi zhes bya ba'i ting nge' dzin yod do// nyon mongs pa spong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// rnam par spong ba zhes bya ba'i
199a14(nyi khri): ting nge 'dzin yod do/ tshol ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// gnas la rten pa med zer zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// sems med pa
199a15(nyi khri): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// dri ma med pa'i sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// 'od mtha' yas shes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do//
199a16(nyi khri): 'ad byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// dag pa dam pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yong/
199a17(nyi khri): 'od dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// dga' ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yong ngo // klog gi sngon ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
199a18(nyi khri): yod do// zad mi shes pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzir yod do// mi 'phams pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// gzi brjid yod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
199a19(nyi khri): yod do// zad pa dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// mi g.yo ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// 'jigs pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod
199a20(nyi khri): ngonyi ma'i sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// zla ba dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// shesar rabasgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/
199a21(nyi khri): snang ba gsol ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// srung ba byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// bya ba byed pa'o zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do//
199a22(nyi khri): ye shes dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// rdo rje lta bu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// sems gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// kun
199a23(nyi khri): tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// rin chen mtha' zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// chos ngam
199a24(nyi khri): pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// dga' ba spong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
199b1(nyi khri): yod do/ chos kyi 'phagaso pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// yi ge dang bla la bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// dmigs pa gcod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod
199b2(nyi khri): 'gyur ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// rnam par med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// ming nges par 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do//
199b3(nyi khri): gnas med par 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// ri rab 'dra ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// spyod pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do//
199b4(nyi khri): g.yo ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// yul las rgal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// yon tan thams cad kyi tshigs su gyur pa zhes bya
199b5(nyi khri): ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// sems med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// sems med par gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// dge ba
199b6(nyi khri): me tog rgyas shing gsal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// sems med par gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// dge ba'i me tog rgyas
199b7(nyi khri): gsal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// byang chub kyi yan lag yod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// spobs pa mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i ting
199b8(nyi khri): nge 'dzin yod do// mi mnyam pa dang mnyam zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// chos thams cad las 'da' ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// yongasu
200a1(nyi khri): gcod pa byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// nem nur rnam par sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// gnasu bya ba
200a2(nyi khri): med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// gcig tu rnam par bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// rnam par mngon par bsgrub pa zhes bya ba'i/
200a3(nyi khri): ting nge badzin yod do// rnam pa gcig tu 'gyur ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// rnam par 'dor ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'i dzin yod do//
200a4(nyi khri): srid pa'i bzhi thams cad rtogs par khong du chud pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// brda' dang sgra la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do//
200a5(nyi khri): sgra dbyangs kyi yi ge dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// sgron ma 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// mtshan nyid yongs su sbyong ba
200a6(nyi khri): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// mngon par dmigs pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// rnam pa'i mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod
200a7(nyi khri): ngobade ba dang sdug bsngal ba thams cad mngon par mi dmigra' ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// zad mi shes pa'i za ma tog ces bya ba'i
200a8(nyi khri): ting nge 'dzin yod do// gzungs kyi blo gros shes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod ngo do// yang dag pa dang log pa thams cad yang dag par sel ba zhes bya
200a9(nyi khri): ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// 'gal ba dang 'gog pa thams cad yang dag par bzhi par byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// thun pa dang
200b1(nyi khri): 'gal ba med pa ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// 'od dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// snying po dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
200b2(nyi khri): yod do// bla ba dri med par rgyas pa'i 'od ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// glog gi 'od ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// rgyan chen po zhes pa'i
200b3(nyi khri): ting nge 'dzin yod do// rnam pa thams cad du 'ong byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// ting nge 'dzin mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
200b4(nyi khri): yod do// rdul med cing rdul dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// nyon mongs pa med par gzhol ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do//
200b5(nyi khri): nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa thams cad nyon mongs pa med par yang dag par gzhol bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// gnas dmigs su med pa la
200b6(nyi khri): brtson pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// de bzhin nyid la gnas shing sems med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// lus kyi skyon yang dag
200b7(nyi khri): par rab tu 'dra ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// ngag gi skyon rnam par 'jigs pas na mkha' ltar gyur pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do//
200b8(nyi khri): shA ra dwa ti'i bu na mkha' ltar chags pa med pas rnam par grol zhing gos pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// ting nge 'dzin nges par spyod pa'i
200b9(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// tshe dang ldan pa
201a1(nyi khri): shA ra dwa ti'i de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin te/ ting nge 'dzin de dag gis rnam par spyod pa'i byang
201a2(nyi khri): chub sems dpa' dpa' chen po rnams ni myur tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/ de ltar ting nge 'dzin dang /
201a3(nyi khri): gzungs kyi sgo gang la bslabs pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par
201a4(nyi khri): rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba de lta bu tshad med grangs med pa gzhan dge kyang yod do// de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'a
201a5(nyi khri): skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang ting nge 'dzin de dag gis rnam par spyod pa de ni sngon gyi
201a6(nyi khri): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan
201a7(nyi khri): te/ da ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
201a8(nyi khri): sangs rgyas zhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba ji snyed cig bzhugs pa de dag gis kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de lung bstan te/ des ni
201b1(nyi khri): ting nge 'dzin kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / bdag tshe snyoms par zhugs so zhes bya bar ting nge 'dzin des rlom sems su 'gyur bya yang shid
201b2(nyi khri): bdag ni snyoms par 'jug go/ bdag gis mnyam par gzhag par bya'o// bdag ni mnyam par gzhag par 'gyur to zhes rlom sems su
201b3(nyi khri): 'gyur ba med do// de la rnam par rtog pa de dag med cing mi rgyu'o// smras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ting nge 'dzin 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sem
201b4(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po la/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis lung bstan yod ngam rab 'byor
201b5(nyi khri): kyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ni med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin po glazhan la ting
201b6(nyi khri): nge 'dzin kyang gzhan byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ces bya ba med kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang ting nge 'dzin to// ting nge 'dzin kyang
201b7(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa'o// byang chub sems dpa' nyid kyang ting nge 'dzin to// smras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gal te/ de ltar ting nge 'dzin
201b8(nyi khri): kyang gzhan la byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan zhes bya ba med/ byang chub sems dpa' gzhan la ting nge 'dzin kyang gzhan zhes bya ba med
202a1(nyi khri): do chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir/ ting nge 'dzin kyang byang chub sems dpa' nyid kyang ting nge 'dzin yin/ de la ting nge 'dzin bsku
202a2(nyi khri): par nus sam/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i de ni ma yin ro// smras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyi rigs kyi bu ting nge 'dzin de la 'du
202a3(nyi khri): shes su byed dam/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shar dwa ti'i bu 'du shes su byed pa med do// smras pa rdo ltar de la 'du shes su byed par mo 'gyu
202a4(nyi khri): rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ rtogs pa med pa'i phyir ro// smras pa de la ji ltar rtog pa med pa yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ chos thams cad med pa'i phyir
202a5(nyi khri): rtog pa med de/ de ltar na ting nge 'dzin de la rtog pa med do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na rigs kyi bu ting nge 'dzin de la rnam par shes
202a6(nyi khri): par byed pa med do// 'du shes su byed pa med do// smras pa ci'i phyir/ rnam par shes pa byed pa med cing 'du shes su 'gyur ba med/ rab 'byor gyis smras
202a7(nyi khri): pa/ ting nge 'dzin de yang med pa la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de yang med pa'i phyir rnam par shes pa med do// 'du shes su 'gyur ba med
202a8(nyi khri): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la legs so zhes bya ba gnang ste/ rab 'byor legs so legs so// tshig 'dzin legs pa
202b1(nyi khri): bshad do// ji ltar nges nyon mongs pa med pa la rnam par spyod pa'i nyan thos kyi nang na mchog tu bshad pa ni 'di yin no// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
202b2(nyi khri): chen pos kyang de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slab par bya'o// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
202b3(nyi khri): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la slab par bya'o// byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnam
202b4(nyi khri): dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad kyi bar la slab par bya'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
202b5(nyi khri): gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi dmigs pa'i tshul
202b6(nyi khri): gyis slob po// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pa
202b7(nyi khri): pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob bo/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos/
202b8(nyi khri): ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob po// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang /
203a1(nyi khri): sangs rgyas kyichis ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis blu za thA// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA
203a2(nyi khri): ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar slob pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob pa yin/ bsam gtan
203a3(nyi khri): gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha
203a4(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob pa yin/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar la
203a5(nyi khri): ming mi gos pa'i tshul gyis slob pa yin no// shA ra dwa ti'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du mi dmigs pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das
203a6(nyi khri): kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir bdag mi dmigs so// sems can dang / 'gro ba dang / gso ba dang / skyes
203a7(nyi khri): bu dang / gang zag dang / shang can dang / shed bdag dang / byed pa po dang / sbyor ba po dang / zhes pa po mo dmigs so// shAn tu rnam par dag pa'i
203a8(nyi khri): phung po dang skye mched dang khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i mi dmigs so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir sdug bsngal mi dmigs//
203b1(nyi khri): shin tu rnam par dag phyir kun 'byung ba dang / 'gog pa dang / lam mi dmigs so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i 'dod pa'i khams mi dmigs so//
203b2(nyi khri): shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir gzugs kyi khams mi dmigs so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir gzugs med pa'i khams mi dmigs so//
203b3(nyi khri): shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir pha rol tu phyin pa rnams mi dmigs so// shin tu rnam par dag phyir byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / 'phags pa'i
203b4(nyi khri): bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa rnams dang /
203b5(nyi khri): mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang /
203b6(nyi khri): ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa
203b7(nyi khri): bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams mi dmigs so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir rgyun tu
203b8(nyi khri): zhugs pa mau dmigs so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas ma
204a1(nyi khri): / dmigs// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' bo rdzogs pa// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phying byang chub mang mag
204a2(nyi khri): sa/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir sangs rgyas mi migs so// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par dag pa gang lags/ bcom ldan
204a3(nyi khri): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad ma skyes pa dang 'gag pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa dang / 'byung ba med
204a4(nyi khri): pa dang / dmigs pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa 'di ni rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba ste/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar ni byang chub sems dpa' sems
204a5(nyi khri): dpa' chen po thams cad mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob pa yin no// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de ldan srab pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems
204a6(nyi khri): dpa' chen po ches gang dang gang la slob pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shAradwa ti'i bu de ltar sgrib pa'i byang chub sems
204a7(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos gang la yangasra ba pa med do// de ci'i sbyor zhen/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu chos 'dod gan byas pas so la skye zos ji ltar ma
204a8(nyi khri): par chags par bya ba de lta bu'i rnam pa yin no// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'an chos 'di ga rnam pa gang gos mchis pa lags/ bcom
204b1(nyi khri): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ji ltar med pa de ltar yod do// de ltar yod pa ma yin pas de'i phyir med ces bya'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
204b2(nyi khri): tsa'i slad du mchis pa ma lags pa la ma mchis pa zhes bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzugs nang stong pa nyid dang /
204b3(nyi khri): dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi phyir yod pa ma yin no// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa nang stong pa nyid ngang
204b4(nyi khri): dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi phyir yod pa yin no// byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyi bar du nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med
204b5(nyi khri): pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir yin no// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad kyi bar du nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa
204b6(nyi khri): nyid kyi phyir yod pa ma yin no// de la byis pa so so'i skye bo'i skye bo rnams med pa la mngon par zhen pas sred pa la mngon par zhen te/ de dag gis pa med
204b7(nyi khri): pa yongs su brtags pas med pa la mngon par zhen cing 'di lta ste/ chad pa dang / rtag pa'i mtha' gnyis ka la chags pa de dag mi shes mi mthong ste/
204b8(nyi khri): gang med pa'i chos de dag yongs su rtags nas ming dang / gzugs la mngon par zhen pa de dag dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams mngon par zhen cing
205a1(nyi khri): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres rnams kyi bar la mngon par zhed to// de dag de ltar mngon par zhen pas yod pa ma yin pa'i chos rnams
205a2(nyi khri): la yongs su rtogs ste/ de dag mi shes pa mthong ngo // ci mi shes mi mthong zhe na/ gzugs mi shes mi mthong ngo // tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed
205a3(nyi khri): dang rnam par shes pa mi shes mi mthong ngo // skye mched dang khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba mi shes mi mthong ngo // byang chub kyi phyogs
205a4(nyi khri): kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun mi shes mi mthong ngo // sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar du mi shes mi mthong ngo // de dag ni byis pa zhes bya ba
205a5(nyi khri): grangasu 'dod pa ste/ de dag 'byung ba ma yin no// gang ras 'byung ba ma yin zhe na 'dod pa'i khams nas 'byung ba ma yin no// gzugs kyi khams
205a6(nyi khri): ras 'byung ba ma yin no// gzugs med pa'i khams nas 'byung ba ma yin no// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa nas 'byung ba ma yin/
205a7(nyi khri): de dag ni yid mchis pa ste/ ji ltar yid mchis zhen/ gzugs gzugs kyis stong zhes bya bar yid ches so// byang chub kyi bar du byang chub kyis
205a8(nyi khri): stong ngo zhes bya bar yid mchis so// deng ga ni gnas pa ma yin pa ste/ ji ltar gnas po ma yin zhe na/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gnas pa ma yin/
205b1(nyi khri): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
205b2(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas nas ma yin/ phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas pa ma yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar la
205b3(nyi khri): gnas pa ma yin/ de dag ni mngon par zhen pa yin no// ji ltar mngon par zhen pa yin zhe na/ gzugs la mngon par zhen pa yin tshor ba dang //
205b4(nyi khri): 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa la mngon par zhen pa yin/ mig la mngon par zhen pa yin/ rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang
205b5(nyi khri): yid la mngon par zhen pa yin/ skye mched dang khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la mngon par zhen pa yin/ 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang
205b6(nyi khri): gti mug la mngon par zhen pa ma yin/ lta bar 'gyur ba rnams la mngon par len pa yin/ byang chub kyi bar la mngon par zhen pa yin te/ de'i phyir
205b7(nyi khri): byis pa zhes bya'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
205b8(nyi khri): mi slob cing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mi 'byung ba lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar slob pa
206a1(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi slob pa yin/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mi 'byung
206a2(nyi khri): kha yino// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mo bslob pa lags/ rnam pa thams cad
206a3(nyi khri): mkhyen pa nyid du mi byung ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'ang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs
206a4(nyi khri): mi mkhas pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtags shing mngon par med/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu
206a5(nyi khri): phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la brtags shing mngon par zhen/
206a6(nyi khri): stong pa nyid thams cad dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams
206a7(nyi khri): dang stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la brtags shing mngon par zhen/
206a8(nyi khri): 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams pa dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams da
206b1(nyi khri): rngam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang /
206b2(nyi khri): mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa
206b3(nyi khri): bzhi dang so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad la brtags shing mngon par zhe na/ rnam pa thams
206b4(nyi khri): cang mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la brtags shing mngon par zhen pas/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
206b5(nyi khri): po de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi slob pa yin/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mi 'byung ba yin no// gsol pa/ bcom
206b6(nyi khri): ldan 'das de lta lags na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam pa gang gis slob par 'gyur ba
206b7(nyi khri): legs/ ji ltar sla bas na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra ti'i bu rnam
206b8(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de mi dmigs
207a1(nyi khri): yang dag par rjes su mi mthong zhing / shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de
207a2(nyi khri): ltar slo bar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'byung ba yin ro// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus
207a3(nyi khri): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyiran pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sbyin pa'i
207a4(nyi khri): pha rol tu phyin pa de mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad
207a5(nyi khri): mkhyen pa nyid mi dmigs so// yang dag par rjes su mi mthong zhing / shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
207a6(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni mo dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa
207a7(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen po de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de lang slob pa ni mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo //
207a8(nyi khri): ba dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu bya
207b1(nyi khri): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gang gi mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ba lags bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
207b2(nyi khri): stsal pa/ nang stong pa nyid med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar mi dbigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'gyur bar shes par byan
207b3(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa las// / le'u drug pa// // de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis bcom ldan 'das la
207b4(nyi khri): 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slabs shing
207b5(nyi khri): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram/ zhes mchi ma/ bcom ldan
207b6(nyi khri): 'das de skad ce du 'dri ba dri la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/ ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu
207b7(nyi khri): phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing rnam pa thams
207b8(nyi khri): cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyi bar la bslabs shing rnam pa thams cad
208a1(nyi khri): mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'ong sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar la skabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
208a2(nyi khri): pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nga thob par 'gyur ram/ nas mchin/ bcom ldan 'angs de skad du bdI ba de la jiskad du bskur bar ba
208a3(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de lta bas na/ khyod nyid ladzes/ khyod kyis ji ltar bzong po'i ji ltar lung ston cig/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du
208a4(nyi khri): sems gzugs kyang gzhan la sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnab par shes pa yongs su gzhan la rgyu ma yang
208a5(nyi khri): gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems
208a6(nyi khri): mig kyang gzhan la sgyu ma yang gzhang zhig yir snyam 'am/ rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang lus dang yid kyang ga'ang la sgyum yang gzhan zhig yon snyam 'am/ gzugs
208a7(nyi khri): kyang gzhan la sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yonas pa 'am/ ska dang rjo nga/ r-i dang / reg dang / chos kyang gzhan la snyam yang ga' mazhig san snyam 'am/ mog sarnam
208a8(nyi khri): par shes pa yang gzhan la sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus
208b1(nyi khri): kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa yang gzhan la sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa yang gzhan la sgyu ma yang gzham
208b2(nyi khri): zhig ya ni snyam 'am/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi'i dus te reg pa yang
208b3(nyi khri): gzhan la sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yang gzhan la sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ rna ba'i 'dus te
208b4(nyi khri): reg pa'i rkyeni gyis tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tsher ba drang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lus kyis 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
208b5(nyi khri): tshor ba dang / yid kyis 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gzhan la sgyu ma gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar ma lags so//
208b6(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyi bar yang gzhan la sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin
208b7(nyi khri): snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ sangs rgyas kyi chos
208b8(nyi khri): ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar yang gnan la sgyum yang gzhan zhig yid snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das
