209a1(nyi khri): kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ byang chub kyang gzhan la sgyum yang gzhan zhig yid snyam 'am/ gsol pa/
209a2(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das gzugs kyang gzhan ma lags sgyu ma yang gzhir ma lags ste/ gzugs nyid kyang sgyu ma
209a3(nyi khri): sgyu ma nyid kyang gzugs so// bcom ldan 'das tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa yang gzhan ma lags sgyu ma yang gzhi ma
209a4(nyi khri): legs ste/ rnam par shes pa nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o// bcom ldan 'das mig kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzham
209a5(nyi khri): ma lags ste/ mig nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang mig go// bcom ldan 'das rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang lus dang / yid kyang ga zhan ma lags
209a6(nyi khri): sgyu ma yang ma lags ste/ yid nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang yid do// bcom ldan 'das gzugs kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhang ma lag
209a7(nyi khri): ste/ gzugs nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang gzugs so// bcom ldan 'das sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / re ga dang chos kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang
209a8(nyi khri): gzhan ma lags ste/ chos nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang dros so// bcom ldan 'das mig gi rnam par shes pa yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu mi yang ba
209b1(nyi khri): ma lags ste/ mig gi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang sgyum sgyu ma nyid kyang mig gi rnam par shes pa'o// bcom ldan 'das rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sma
209b2(nyi khri): rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa yang gzhan ma lags sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags
209b3(nyi khri): ste/ yid kyi rnams par shes pa nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'o// bcom ldan 'das mig gi 'dus te reg pa yang gzhan ma lags
209b4(nyi khri): sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags ste/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa yang sgyu ma sgyu ma yang bag gi 'dus te reg pa yang sgyu ma sgyu ma yang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'o//
209b5(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg
209b6(nyi khri): pa yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags ste/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'o// bcom ldan 'ang
209b7(nyi khri): mig gi 'dus te pa reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yang ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags ste/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyi tshor ba nyid kyang sgyu ma
209b8(nyi khri): sgyu ma nyid kyang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// bcom ldan 'das rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i
210a1(nyi khri): rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus
210a2(nyi khri): te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhanam lags ste/ yod kyi 'dus te rig pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang sbram snum nyid kyi
210a3(nyi khri): yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyed gyis tshor ba'o// bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyi bar yang ga' nga ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhon ma las
210a4(nyi khri): ste byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams so// bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa
210a5(nyi khri): brgyad kyi bar yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa nyid kyang sgyu ma nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
210a6(nyi khri): parnams// bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi bar yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gnan ma lags ste/ byang chub nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyum nyid kyang byang chub
210a7(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ sgyum la skye ba'am 'gag pa pa yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom 'das
210a8(nyi khri): de ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems// sgyum la kun nas nyon mongs pa 'am/ sleb
210b1(nyi khri): yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems casgyu ma kun nas
210b2(nyi khri): nyon mongs pa 'am/ rnam par byang ba yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byer
210b3(nyi khri): de ji snyam du sems/ gang la skye ba med cing 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med cing rnam par byang ba med pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
210b4(nyi khri): pa la slob par 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram/
210b5(nyi khri): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni mi 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ nye bar len pa'i/
210b6(nyi khri): phung po lnga po 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'du shes dang / brda' dang gdags pa dang tha snyad du bya ba yin nam/ gsol pa/
210b7(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ 'du shes dang / badz+ra dang
210b8(nyi khri): gdag pa dang / tha snyad tsam gyis nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga skye ba 'am 'gag pa'am/ kun nas nyon mongs pa 'am rnam par byang bar dmigs
211a1(nyi khri): par 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni mi 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du
211a2(nyi khri): sems/ gang la 'du shes med cing brda med pa dang / gdags pa med pa dang / tha snyad med pa dang / ming med pa dang / ming du gdag pa med pa dang / lus
211a3(nyi khri): pa dang / lus kyi las med pa dang / ngag med pa dang / ngag gi las med pa dang / yid med pa dang / yid kyi las med pa dang / skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa ming
211a4(nyi khri): padang kur ras nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du
211a5(nyi khri): 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni mi 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ra ba 'byor de ltar byang chub sems
211a6(nyi khri): dpo' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs par mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo //
211a7(nyi khri): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spobs pa'i byang chub sem
211a8(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sgyu ma'i skyes bus slab pa ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu srab par bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhen
211b1(nyi khri): sa 'di snyas/ brang snyam pa da/ sgyum 'i gyis par rig par shes sabam ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'bra
211b2(nyi khri): ji snyam du sems/ phung po lnga po 'di dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ gsol
211b3(nyi khri): pa bcom ldan 'das de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de lta 'di ltar phung po rnams ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin te/ dngos po ma mchis
211b4(nyi khri): pa'i rang bzhin ni dmi gsum mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ rmi lam lta bu'i phung po lnga pa
211b5(nyi khri): de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsla bas shing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma
211b6(nyi khri): 'gyur ro// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'angadi ltar zilam de dngos po ma mchis pa'i ra bzhin te/ dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin de mi
211b7(nyi khri): dmigs su ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma dang / sgra snyan lta bu dang / mig g.yo
211b8(nyi khri): lta bu dang / chu zla lta bu dang / mig sgyu lta bu dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'o sprul pa lta bu'i phung po lnga po de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slabs shing
212a1(nyi khri): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de ni mo 'gyur ro// de na'i slad du zhe na/ bcom
212a2(nyi khri): ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar sgyu ma ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin/ sgra bstan ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin/ chu zla ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin
212a3(nyi khri): rmig sgra ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin/ sprul pa ni dngos po ma mchis rang bzhin te/ dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin de ni dmigasu ma mchis so//
212a4(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar gzugs ni rmi lam lta bu/ tshor ba ni rmi lam lta bu/ 'du shes ni rmi lam lta bu
212a5(nyi khri): 'du byed ni rmi la lam lta bu/ rnam par shes pa ni rgo lam lta bu ste/ rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de ni dbang po drug go// ngor phung po lnga'o// ra
212a6(nyi khri): 'byor gzugs ni sgyu ma lta bu/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ni sgyu ma lta bu ste/ rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de na
212a7(nyi khri): dbang po drug go/ de ni phung po lnga'o// rab 'byor gzugs ni sgra bstan lta bu/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ni sgra bas
212a8(nyi khri): lta bu ste/ rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de ni dbang po drug go// don phung ba na// rab 'byor gzugs nimig yor lta bu/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes
212b1(nyi khri): dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ni mig g.yor lta bu ste/ rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de ni dbang po drug go/ de ni phung po lnga'o// rab 'byor gzugs
212b2(nyi khri): ni/ chu zla lta bu/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ni chu zla lta bu ste/ rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de ni dbang po drug go/ de ni phung ba
212b3(nyi khri): lnga'o// rab 'byor gzugs ni smig rgyu lta bu/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ni smig rgyu lta bu ste/ rnam par shes pa gang yin
212b4(nyi khri): pa de ni dbang po drug go/ de ni phung po lnga'o// ra ba 'byor gzugs ri sprul pa lta bu/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes da / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i sbrul
212b5(nyi khri): pa lta bu ste/ rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de ni dbang po drug go// de ni phung po lnga'o// de dag ni nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir mau dmig so// dngos po med pa'i
212b6(nyi khri): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg
212b7(nyi khri): pa la gsar du zhugs pas bstan pa 'di thos nas 'jigs shing sdang ba dang skrag par mi 'gyur ba lags grang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
212b8(nyi khri): pa rab 'byor gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa la ge sar du zhugs pa yin la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la thabs
213a1(nyi khri): kyang mi mkhas pa zhig ste/ dge ba'i bshes nyen gyi lag du yang ma'ongs na/ 'jigs shing spang ba dang / skrag par yang
213a2(nyi khri): 'gyur ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bstan pa 'di thos ma mi 'jigs mi sdang mi skrag pa'i shes
213a3(nyi khri): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la thabs mkhas pa de gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa'
213a4(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis gzugs mi rtag
213a5(nyi khri): ces bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so//
213a6(nyi khri): rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la thabs mkhas pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byung
213a7(nyi khri): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis
213a8(nyi khri): gzugs sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog se mi dmigs so// tshor ba dang // 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bya
213b1(nyi khri): par rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis gzugs bdag med ces bya bar rtogs ste/ de mi
213b2(nyi khri): dmigs so// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa bdag med ces bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams
213b3(nyi khri): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis gzugs zhi zhes bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so// tsher ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang /
213b4(nyi khri): rnam par shes pa zhi zhes bya bar rtog ste de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis gzugs stong zhes bya bar
213b5(nyi khri): rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya bar rtog ste de mi dmigs so// rnam pa
213b6(nyi khri): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis gzugs mtshan med ces bya bar rtog ste de mi dmigs so// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du
213b7(nyi khri): byed de rnam par shes pa mtshan ma med ces bya bar rtog ste de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis
213b8(nyi khri): gzugs smon pa med ces bya bar rtog ste de mi dmigs so// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa smon pa med ces bya
213b9(nyi khri): bar rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems gzugs mngon par 'du bya ba med ces
213b10(nyi khri): bya bar rtog ste de mi dmigs so// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar rtog ste de mi dmig
213b11(nyi khri): so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis gzugs dben zhes bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang /
213b12(nyi khri): 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dber zhes bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so// rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
213b13(nyi khri): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tha bas mkhas pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
213b14(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i che/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byas pas gzugs mi rtag pa'i rnam par rtog par byed
213b15(nyi khri): par byed de de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par
213b16(nyi khri): shes pa mi rtog pa'i rnam par rtog par byed pa de de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs sdug
213b17(nyi khri): par rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis gzugs bdag med ces bya bar rtogs ste/ de ma

213b19(nyi khri): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis gzugs zhi zhes bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang /
213b20(nyi khri): rnam par shes pa zhi zhes bya bar rtog ste de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis gzugs stong zhes bya bar
213b21(nyi khri): rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya bar rtog ste de mi dmigs so// rnam pa
213b22(nyi khri): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis gzugs mtshan med ces bya bar rtog ste de mi dmigs so// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du
213b23(nyi khri): byed de/ rnam par shes pa mtshan ma med ces bya bar rtog ste de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cang mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis
213b24(nyi khri): gzugs smon pa med ces bya bar rtog ste de mi dmigs so// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa smon pa med ces bya

214a8(nyi khri): shes pa mi rtog pa'i rnam par rtog par byed pa de de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs sdug
214b1(nyi khri): bsngal ba'i rnam par rtog par byed de/ de mi dmigs so// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal ba'i rtog pa
214b2(nyi khri): par byed de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs bdag med pa'i rnam par rtog par byed de de mi
214b3(nyi khri): dmigs so// tshor ba dang 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa bdag ces med pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de de mi dmigs so// rnam pa
214b4(nyi khri): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs zhi ba'i rnam par rtogs par byed de de mi dmigs so// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang
214b5(nyi khri): 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa zhi ba'i rnam par rtogs par byed de mi dmigaso// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa pa nyid ldan pa'i yid la bya bas//
214b6(nyi khri): gzugs stong pa ra rtogs par byed de mi dmigs so// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa stong pa'i rnam par rtogs par
214b7(nyi khri): byed de mi dimigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs mtshan ma med pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de de
214b8(nyi khri): mi dmigs so// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa mtshan ma med pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de de mi dmigs so//
215a1(nyi khri): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs smor pa med pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de de dmigs so// tshor ba dang
215a2(nyi khri): 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa smon pa med pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa yid la
215a3(nyi khri): bya bas/ gzugs mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i mngon par rtogs par byed de mi dmigs so// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i
215a4(nyi khri): mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i mngon par rtogs par byed de de mi dmyigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs dben
215a5(nyi khri): pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de de mi dmigs so// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i dben pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de ngam
215a6(nyi khri): dmigs so// rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o// rab 'byor
215a7(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar rtogs pa de 'di snyam du sems te/ sems can thams cad la gzugs mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs
215a8(nyi khri): pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa mi rtog ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to//
215b1(nyi khri): gzugs sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / zhi ba dang / stong pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / dben
215b2(nyi khri): pa zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to// skam mo// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal ba dang //
215b3(nyi khri): pa dag dang bdag med pa dang / zhi ba dang / stong pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / dben zhes bya bar de mi
215b4(nyi khri): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to// snyam mo// rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ de yod
215b5(nyi khri): pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'jigs mi sdang skrag par mi 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
215b6(nyi khri): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas yid la bya ba dang / mi ldan pas gzugs gang mi rtag pa'i rnam
215b7(nyi khri): par yod la byed pa de ming mi gos pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ tsher ba dang / 'du shes
215b8(nyi khri): dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa mi rtag pa'i rnam par yod la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yod la byed do// nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas
216a1(nyi khri): yod la bu ba dang / ma ldan pas gzugs gang sdug bsngal ba dang / ba meng pa dang / rnaM pa dang / stong pa dang / mdzangs med pa nga
216a2(nyi khri): smon pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / da ben pa'i rnam par yong la byed pa de po dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ying la byed do// tshor ba
216a3(nyi khri): 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / zhi ba dang / stong pa dang / mdzad ma yong pa dang / smon pa ma
216a4(nyi khri): pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / dben po'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// rab 'byor 'dzin bya
216a5(nyi khri): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyams pa med pa ste/ de yod pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
216a6(nyi khri): po ma 'jigs mi sdang skrag par mi 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
216a7(nyi khri): stong pa'i che/ chos de dag thams cad la mi rtag pa'i rnam pa dang / sdug bsngal ba'i rnam pa dang / bdag med pa'i rnam pa dang / snad pa tshod kyi rnam
216a8(nyi khri): nga mtshan ma meng pa'i rnam pa dang / smon pa med pa rnam pa dang / mngan par bya bamed pa'i rnam pa dang / dben pa'i rnam par rtag par byang ba dang /

216b2(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzug
216b3(nyi khri): mi rtog ces bya bar nge mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par bshes pa mi rtog ces bya bar de ma

216b6(nyi khri): rab tu rtog go// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya
216b7(nyi khri): ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshon ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben
216b8(nyi khri): zhes bya bar mi migs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go// de ltar de dag la rnam pa de dag thams cad mkhyim pa nyid dang ljon pa'i yid la bya bas ma
217a1(nyi khri): zhing brtson 'grus mi 'dor ba'ang ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ de yod
217a2(nyi khri): pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de mi 'jigs mi sdang skrag par mi 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
217a3(nyi khri): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs mi rtag ces bya
217a4(nyi khri): par de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis me rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yong la bya ba dang / mi dge ba'i chos de ma yin pa byang chub
217a5(nyi khri): rdzobagegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi skabs mi 'byed pa dang / gzugs sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / ni zhes bya ba dang
217a6(nyi khri): stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar nges
217a7(nyi khri): dmigs pa'i tshul gos rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba ma yor pa byang chub kyi grogs su 'gyur
217a8(nyi khri): kha gzham gyi go mo 'byed pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa mau rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba nga
217b1(nyi khri): bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces
217b2(nyi khri): bya ba dang / dben zhes bya ba de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa
217b3(nyi khri): byang chub kyi grogs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go ma'i byed pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/
217b4(nyi khri): de yod pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ma 'jigs ma sdang skrag par mi 'gyur ro// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu
217b5(nyi khri): lnga pa// bam po bcu gnyis pa// / rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
217b6(nyi khri): la spyod pa'o tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba'i rnam pa 'di ltar rab tu rtog ste/ gzugs kyi stong pa nyid gzugs
217b7(nyi khri): stong pa ma yon gyi/ gzugs nyid kyang stong pa nyid de stong pa ny-id kyang gzugs so// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes
217b8(nyi khri): nyid kyang stong pa nyid ngo stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o// mig gi stong pa nyid kyis mig stong pa ma yin gyi/ mig nyid kyang stong pa nying ngo //
218a1(nyi khri): stong pa nyid kyang migas+ho/ rna bang sbyang sbed du nga gyi snang pa la pa sung smra ts+tsha / spyong pa /
218a2(nyi khri): kyang yid do// gzugs kyi stong pa nyid kyis gzugs stong ba ma yin gyi/ gzugs nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang gzugs sa// sgra dang / drod pa
218a3(nyi khri): ro dang / reg dang / chos kyi stong pa nyid kyis stong pa nyid ma yin gyis/ stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang chos so// mig gi rnam par shes
218a4(nyi khri): pa'i stong pa nyid kyis mig gi rnam par shes pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ mig gi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang mog gi rnam par shes
218a5(nyi khri): pa'o// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes
218a6(nyi khri): pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang yid kyi rnam
218a7(nyi khri): par shes pa'o// mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i stong pa nyid/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa nyid stong pa nyid do//
218a8(nyi khri): stong pa nyid kyang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'o// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus
218b1(nyi khri): reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyis yid kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa pa yin gyi/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid ngo //
218b2(nyi khri): pa nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'o// mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyis/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i stong pa ma yin gyi/ mig
218b3(nyi khri): gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i
218b4(nyi khri): rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te rig pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lus kyis 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
218b5(nyi khri): gyis tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i stong pa nyid kyis yid kyi'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa ma yin gyi/
218b6(nyi khri): yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// dran pa nye bar
218b7(nyi khri): gzhag pa'i bar gyi stong pa nyid kyis/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong
218b8(nyi khri): pa nyid kyang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i bar gyi stong pa nyid kyis/ sangs rgyas kyis kyis chos ma 'dres pa
218b9(nyi khri): sangs rgyas kyis chos ma 'dres pa stong pa ma yin gyi/
219a1(nyi khri): shes ma gyi la la / ldan
219a2(nyi khri): ljid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'o// rab 'byor 'di byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
219a3(nyi khri): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' cher pon bstan pa 'di thos ma/ mi 'jigs ma snga
219a4(nyi khri): skrag par mi 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa
219a5(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa thos de/ mi 'jigs ma snang skrag par mi 'gyur ba'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen da ngag
219a6(nyi khri): lags bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni gang
219a7(nyi khri): la gzugs mi brtag ces bya bar mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsi ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
219a8(nyi khri): gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sbyor mi 'jug go// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par
219a9(nyi khri): pa mi rtag ces bya bar de dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsab thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa tshong ma gtogs pa
219b1(nyi khri): nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa ste/ rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
219b2(nyi khri): ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o// rab 'byor ga'ang yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni gang de
219b3(nyi khri): la gzugs sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos skyed pa dang / tsher kha dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa
219b4(nyi khri): sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / gzugs bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan
219b5(nyi khri): pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa bdag med me ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / gzugs
219b6(nyi khri): no zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i zhes bya bar ngem
219b7(nyi khri): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / gzugs stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos kyi ston pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang /
219b8(nyi khri): 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya ba de ma dmigs pa'i tshul gyi smra son pa dang / gzugs mtshan ma med bces bya ba de mo dmigs pa'i tshul
220a1(nyi khri): / gyis chos ston pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ma rnamame ces bya bar ngami dmigs pa'i rdul tsas
220a2(nyi khri): chos ston pa dang / gzugs smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'dra byed dang / rnam par
220a3(nyi khri): basmon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / gzugs mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mo dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
220a4(nyi khri): chos ston pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'dra shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes par mngon par 'du 'bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa
220a5(nyi khri): tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / gzugs dben zhes bya bar de mi dpogs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam
220a6(nyi khri): par shes pa dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs
220a7(nyi khri): par/ na thos gos 'am// rang sangs rgyas kyis yongs su sor po 'jug pa sa/ rab 'byong 'don byung chubasems dpa' sems dpa' che bas
220a8(nyi khri): bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen mo gang de la mig ma
220b1(nyi khri): ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / rna ba dang / snu dpa lnga dang / lus dang / yid pi rtag ces bya bar de ma dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston
220b2(nyi khri): pa dang / mag sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid bsdug bsngal zhes bya bar
220b3(nyi khri): de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyi chos ston pa dang / mig bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus
220b4(nyi khri): dang / yid bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / mig zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / rna ba dang
220b5(nyi khri): sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / mig stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston
220b6(nyi khri): pa dang / rna ba dang / snga dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / mig mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmag
220b7(nyi khri): pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid mtshan ma mang ces bya bar me pags pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / mag
220b8(nyi khri): smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / ying spon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa
220b9(nyi khri): tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / mig mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / rna ba dang / sna
220b10(nyi khri): dang / lce dang / lus yod don par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigos pa'i tshul gyis chos stor pa dang / mi gang be ma zhes bya bar de ma dmigs pa
220b11(nyi khri): tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid dben pa zhes bya bar de ming migs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge
220b12(nyi khri): rtsa ba de dag thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos sam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa
220b13(nyi khri): rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni gang de la gzugs mi rtag pa ces bya bar de ma
220b14(nyi khri): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am
220b15(nyi khri): rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos martog ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul
220b16(nyi khri): gyis chos son cing / dge ba'i rtsab de dag kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyis 'am/ rang sangs rgyas
220b17(nyi khri): ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / rna ba dang / sna pa lce dang / lus dang / ying mi rtag ces bya bar nge mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston
220b18(nyi khri): pa dang / mig sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / ying bsdug bsngal zhes bya bar
220b19(nyi khri): de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyi chos ston pa dang / mig bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus
220b20(nyi khri): dang / yid bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / mig zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / rna ba dang
220b21(nyi khri): sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / mig stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston
220b22(nyi khri): pa dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / mig mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmig
220b23(nyi khri): pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / ma
220b24(nyi khri): smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / ying slong ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs
221a1(nyi khri): tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / mig mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / rna ba dang / sna
221a2(nyi khri): dang / lce dang / lus yod don par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stor pa dang / mo gang ben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i
221a3(nyi khri): tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid dben pa zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba
221a4(nyi khri): rtsa ba de dag thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos sam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa
221a5(nyi khri): rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i khashes gnyen ni gang de la gzugs mi rtag pa ces bya bar de ma
221a6(nyi khri): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/
221a7(nyi khri): rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mo 'jug pa dang / skra dang / dr-i dang / ro dang / reg byu dang / chos martog ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul
221a8(nyi khri): gyis chos sngon cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyis 'am/ rang sangs rgyas
221b1(nyi khri): sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa dang / gzugs sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi migs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg
221b2(nyi khri): chos sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / gzugs bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
221b3(nyi khri): chos ston pa dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg dang / chos bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / gzugs
221b4(nyi khri): zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg dang / chos bzhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul
221b5(nyi khri): gyis chos ston pa dang / gzugs stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg dang / chos stong
221b6(nyi khri): zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / sgra dang dri dang ro dang / reg dang / chos stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
221b7(nyi khri): chos ston pa dang / gzugs mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg dang / chos
221b8(nyi khri): mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / gzugs ston pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
222a1(nyi khri): chos stod pa dang / sgra dang drangs / ro dang reg dang / chos smon pa med ces bya bar de mang dathogs pa'i tshul gyis chos stong pa dang / gzugs
222a2(nyi khri): mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg dang / chos mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya
222a3(nyi khri): bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / gzugs dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / sgra dang dI dang ro dang reg
222a4(nyi khri): dang chos dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma rtogs
222a5(nyi khri): pa nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen ba
222a6(nyi khri): dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni gang de la mig gi rnam par shes pa'i mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa
222a7(nyi khri): thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ na thos kyis 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor ma 'jug pa dang /
222a8(nyi khri): rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa
222b1(nyi khri): mi rtag ces bya bar de pi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos
222b2(nyi khri): kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mo 'jug pa dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
222b3(nyi khri): chos ston pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi
222b4(nyi khri): rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa bdag med ces bya bar de mi mig
222b5(nyi khri): pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang
222b6(nyi khri): yid kyi rnam par shes pa bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa ni zhes bya bar de mi dmigs
222b7(nyi khri): pa'i tshul gyis chos pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang /
222b8(nyi khri): yid kyi rnam pa ni zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya bar ngo mi migs pa'i rdul
223a1(nyi khri): kyis chos ston pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam pa
223a2(nyi khri): shes pa dang / yod kyi rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya bar de pi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa mtshan pa med pa ces bya
223a3(nyi khri): bar de dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam
223a4(nyi khri): par shes pa mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang
223a5(nyi khri): lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston
223a6(nyi khri): pa dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du bya bar med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes
223a7(nyi khri): pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du bya
223a8(nyi khri): pa med pa ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
223b1(nyi khri): chos ston pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid
223b2(nyi khri): kyi rnam par shes pa nga ben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
223b3(nyi khri): mi gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug ste/ rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sem
223b4(nyi khri): dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba
223b5(nyi khri): bshes gnyen ni gang de la mig gi 'dus te reg pa mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing // dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag
223b6(nyi khri): kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa dang /
223b7(nyi khri): rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ma
223b8(nyi khri): rtog ces bya bar nge mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mi gtog
224a1(nyi khri): par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa sdug bsngal
224a2(nyi khri): zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus
224a3(nyi khri): kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa bdag
224a4(nyi khri): med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang /
224a5(nyi khri): lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa
224a6(nyi khri): zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus
224a7(nyi khri): kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa stong zhes bya bar
224a8(nyi khri): de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg
224b1(nyi khri): yid kyi 'dus te reg pa stong / zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs
224b2(nyi khri): pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / sra rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyis 'dus te reg pa dang //
224b3(nyi khri): yid kyi 'dus te reg pa mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa smon pa med ces bya bar de mi
224b4(nyi khri): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg
224b5(nyi khri): pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa mngon par 'du bya ba
224b6(nyi khri): med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa
224b7(nyi khri): dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang /
224b8(nyi khri): mig gi 'dus te reg pa dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang /
225a1(nyi khri): lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus ti ga pang zer zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stom
225a2(nyi khri): cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug
225a3(nyi khri): pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyem gang de la mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung
225a4(nyi khri): tshor ba mi rtag ces bya bar mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos storan cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/
225a5(nyi khri): nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te
225a6(nyi khri): reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / yad
225a7(nyi khri): 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi rtag ces bya bar de ming migs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsib thams cad kyang rnam pa tham
225a8(nyi khri): cang mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs pa dang / na thos kyis 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa las
225b1(nyi khri): byung ba'i tshor ba sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de myi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / snga
225b2(nyi khri): te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / yid kyi
225b3(nyi khri): 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de ming dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshi
225b4(nyi khri): ba bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / rnga ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa
225b5(nyi khri): las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byang ba'i tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus
225b6(nyi khri): te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dag med ces bya bar ngo mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tsher
225b7(nyi khri): bzho zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa
225b8(nyi khri): byang ba'i tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus
226a1(nyi khri): te dag pa las byung ba'i tshor ba na zhes bya bar du mi dmigs pa'i rgyal nas bston pa dang / g+sa gi 'dus te rig pa la
226a2(nyi khri): byang ba'i tshor ba stang zhes bya bar ngo ma dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te rig pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus
226a3(nyi khri): rig pa las byung ba'i 'tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byang ba'i tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / nga
226a4(nyi khri): kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / mig gi 'dus te rig pa las byung ba'i
226a5(nyi khri): tshor ba mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las 'byung ba'i tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus
226a6(nyi khri): te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshong ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / yang
226a7(nyi khri): kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa las
226a8(nyi khri): byung ba'i tshor ba mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byang ba'i tshor
226b1(nyi khri): bdang / sna'i 'dus te rig pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus kyi reg pa las byung ba
226b2(nyi khri): tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de ba dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stor ba dang / mig gis
226b3(nyi khri): 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngos ston pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang /
226b4(nyi khri): sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang
226b5(nyi khri): yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa
226b6(nyi khri): thams cad mkhyen pa pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// bcom ldan 'das rab 'byor
226b7(nyi khri): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen gang de la byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyi bar du mi rtog ces
226b8(nyi khri): bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stod pa dang / sdug bsngal ba zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / mi zhes bya ba dang / stong
227a1(nyi khri): bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar
227a2(nyi khri): de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams ston pa'i phyir de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba
227a3(nyi khri): rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mi gtogs par nyan thos gyis 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa dang / sang
227a4(nyi khri): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar du mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med
227a5(nyi khri): ces bya ba dang / ni zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang
227a6(nyi khri): dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bslab pa'i phyir de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos sna
227a7(nyi khri): pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du bsgom pa'i phyir te/ de ni mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / byang chub kyi bar du bsgom
227a8(nyi khri): pa'i phyir de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du ma gtogs par nyan thos
227b1(nyi khri): kyis 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mo 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' duba' chen po'i dge ba'i banas gnyen du
227b2(nyi khri): shes par bya ste/ dge ba'i gshes gnyen des yongs su zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'ang
227b3(nyi khri): thos na mi 'jigs mi spang skrag par mi 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
227b4(nyi khri): po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di thos pa ni 'jigs shing sdang la skrag par 'gyur zhing
227b5(nyi khri): tha bas mi mkhas pa ste/ sdig pa'i grogs po'i sug par lung zhing / dge ba'i bshes panyen gyis yongs su spangs pa las/ bcom ldan 'das
227b6(nyi khri): kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa tham
227b7(nyi khri): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yod la bya ba'i med par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom zhing dmigs te shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
227b8(nyi khri): rlom sems byed pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom zhing dmigs te/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa des rlom sems su byed
228a1(nyi khri): pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom zhing dmigs te/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa des rlom sems su byed pa dang /
228a2(nyi khri): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rlom sems su byed pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom zhing dmigs te/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rlom sem
228a3(nyi khri): su byed pa dang / sbyin po'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom zhing dmigs te/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa des rlom sems su byed pa de lta bu ni rab 'byor byung
228a4(nyi khri): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thebs mkhas par rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
228a5(nyi khri): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ gzugs nang stong pa zhes bya bar
228a6(nyi khri): yid la byed/ gzugs phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yod la byed/ gzugs phyi nang stong pa nyid zhes bya bar yid la byed/ gzugs dngos po med
228a7(nyi khri): pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi bar yid la byed/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar zhes
228a8(nyi khri): bya bar yid la byed cing / dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ nang stong pa nyid de yang dmigs/ phyi stong pa nyid de yang dmigs/ phyi nang stong pa nyid de yang
228a9(nyi khri): migs/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar de yang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid de dag gis rlom sems su byed do// mig nang stong pa
228b1(nyi khri): zhes bya bar yid la byed/ mig phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ mig phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ mig dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid
228b2(nyi khri): stong pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya bar yid la byed/ rna ba dang / sna dang / lho dang / lus dang / yid la nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ yid gyi stong pa zhes
228b3(nyi khri): bya bar yid la byed/ yid phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ yid dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya bar yid la byed cing /
228b4(nyi khri): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ nang stong pa nyid de yang dmigs/ phyi stong pa nyid de yang dmigs/ phyi nang stong pa nyid de yang dmigs/ dngos po med
228b5(nyi khri): pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar de yang dmigs la stong pa nyid de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do// gzugs nang stong pa nyid zhes bya bar yid
228b6(nyi khri): la byed/ gzugs phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ gzugs phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ gzugs dngos po med pa'i ngo bo
228b7(nyi khri): stong pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya bar yid la byed/ skra dang ringang dang reg dang rjes nang snang ba zhes bya bar yod la byed cing chos bya stong pa zhes bya bar ma
228b8(nyi khri): la byed/ chos phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ chos dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar yid la byed/ de dgras pa'i tshul gyis
229a1(nyi khri): nang stong pa nyid de yang dmigs pa stong pa nyid de yang dmigs/ phyi nang stong pa nyid de yang dmigs/ dngos po med pa'i ngo
229a2(nyi khri): stong pa nyid kyi bar de yang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid de dag gos kyang rlom sems su byed de/ mig gi rnam par shes par nang stong pa zhes bya bar ya
229a3(nyi khri): la byed/ mag gi rnam par shes pa phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yong la byed/ mig gi rnam par shes pa phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/
229a4(nyi khri): mig gi rnam par shes pa dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi bar zhes bya bar yid la byed/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang /
229a5(nyi khri): lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ yid kyi rnam par
229a6(nyi khri): shes pa phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ yid gyi rnam par shes pa phyin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa
229a7(nyi khri): dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi bar shes bya bar yod la byed cing / dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid de yang dmigs/ phyi stod pa nyid
229a8(nyi khri): de yang dmigs/ phyi nang stong pa nyid de yang dmigs/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar de yang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid de dag
229b1(nyi khri): gos kyang rlom sems su byed do// mig gis 'dus te reg pa nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa phyi stong pa zhes bya
229b2(nyi khri): bar yid la byed/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
229b3(nyi khri): kyi bar yid la byed/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid
229b4(nyi khri): kyi 'dus te reg pa nang stong pa nyid zhes bya bar yid la byed/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ yid kyi 'dus te
229b5(nyi khri): reg pa phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ yid la kyi 'dus te reg pa dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya bar yid la byed cing
229b6(nyi khri): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang stong pa nyid de yang dmigs/ phyi stong pa nyid de yang dmigs/ phyi nang stong pa nyid de yang dmigs/ dngos po
229b7(nyi khri): med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi bar de yang dmigs la stong pa nyid de dag gi rlom sems su byed do// mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nang
229b8(nyi khri): stong pa nyid zhes bya bar yid la byed/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba phyi stong pa nyid zhes bya bar yid la byed/ mig gi 'dus
230a1(nyi khri): te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dngos po meng pa'i ngo ba
230a2(nyi khri): nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya bar yid la byed/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lce
230a3(nyi khri): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nang stong pa zhes bya
230a4(nyi khri): bar yid la byed/ byi stod pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ phyi nang stong pa nyid zhes bya bar yid la byed/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar
230a5(nyi khri): zhes bya bar yid la byed cing / dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid de yang dmigs/ byi stong pa nyid de yang dmigs/ phyi nang stong pa nyid de yang
230a6(nyi khri): dmigs/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi bar de yang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid de dag gos kyang rlom sems su byed do// sa'i khams snang
230a7(nyi khri): nyid ces bya bar yid la byed/ sa'i khams phyi stong pa nyid ces bya bar yid la byed/ sa'i khams phyi rang stong pa nyid ces bya bar yid la byed
230a8(nyi khri): sa'i khams dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya bar yong la byed/ chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung bgi khams dang / nam
230b1(nyi khri): mkha'i khams dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams nang stong pa nyid ces bya bar yid la byed/ rnam par shes pa'i khams phyi stong pa nyid ces bya bar yid la byed/
230b2(nyi khri): rnam par shes pa'i khams phyi nang stong pa nyid ces bya bar yid la byed/ rnam par shes pa'i khams dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya
230b3(nyi khri): par yid la byed/ ma rig pa dang stong pa nyid ces bya bar yid la byed/ ma rig pa phyi stong pa nyid ces bya bar yid la byed/ ma rig pa phyi nang stong pa nyid ces
230b4(nyi khri): bya bar yid la byed/ ma rig pa dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya bar yid la byed/ 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang / ming dang
230b5(nyi khri): gzugs dang / skye mched drug dang / reg pa dang / tshor ba dang / sred pa dang / len pa dang / srid pa dang / skye ba dang / rga shi nang/ stong pa nyid ces bya bar yid la
230b6(nyi khri): byed rga shi byi stong pa nyid ces bya bar ying la byed/ rga shi phyi nang stong pa nyid ces bya bar yid la byed/ rga shi dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar
230b7(nyi khri): zhes bya bar yod la byed cing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ nang stong pa nyid de yang dmigs/ phyistong pa nyid de yang dmigs/ phyi nang stong pa nyid de yang
230b8(nyi khri): dmigs dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya bar de yang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do// rab 'byor
231a1(nyi khri): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
231a2(nyi khri): dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams bsgom ste/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dran pa nye bar gzhag pa de dag kyang dmigs la/
231a3(nyi khri): dran pa nye bar gzhag pa de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do// yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyis rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang /
231a4(nyi khri): stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa rnams dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang /
231a5(nyi khri): bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnams par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis
231a6(nyi khri): gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshar ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'am
231a7(nyi khri): rnams dang / gzungs kyis rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i snyoms bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa pazhing
231a8(nyi khri): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad bsgomaste/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa de dag gis kyang dmigs la sa
231b1(nyi khri): rgyas kyi chos pa 'dres pa de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
231b2(nyi khri): spyod pa'i chi/ de ltar thabs ma mkhas pas ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di thos ras 'jigs shing sdang la skrag par 'gyur ro// gsol
231b3(nyi khri): pa bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sdig pa'i grogs pos yongs su zin cing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
231b4(nyi khri): pa bstan pa 'di thos nas 'jigs shing sdang la skrag par 'gyur zhing / sdig pa'i grogs po'i sug par ltung ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
231b5(nyi khri): bka' bu/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sded pa'i grogs po ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i mos
231b6(nyi khri): pa med par byed cing zlog par byed pa'o// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin
231b7(nyi khri): dang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe mos pa med par byed cing zlog par byed pa ste/ 'di ni de bzhin
231b8(nyi khri): gshegs pas gsungs pa rnams ma yin/ 'di ni chos ma yin/ 'di ni 'dul ba ma yin gyis de la bslab par bya ba'i phyir mi chi'o// mdo sde 'a
232a1(nyi khri): ngag ni rang gzor byas pa ste/ 'dirig mnyan par mi bya'o// gzung bar mi bya'o// bcang bar mi'o// klag par mi bya'o// kur chu
232a2(nyi khri): par mi bya'o// rgyal bzhid du yid la po bya'o// 'di gatshig 'jal bstan par mi bya'o// zhes zer ba' tsho ba 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems
232a3(nyi khri): dpa' chen po'o sdog pa'i grogs par rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gsar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' tshor pa'i sdig pa'i grogs po 'ja
232a4(nyi khri): bdung sdig tsor/ sangs rgyas kyi cha byang du byas pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du 'ongs nas/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug las
232a5(nyi khri): ci mas pa med par byed / rigs kyi bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pas khyod la tsa log / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu byed pa bsnams pas
232a6(nyi khri): khyod la tshe rig b+ha/ brjon 'grus kyi pha rol tu byon pa bsgoms pas khyod la mimig bya/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms pas khyong la tsarog bya
232a7(nyi khri): tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgoms pas khyod la ci zhig bya/ sbyor pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms pas khyod la ci zhig bya/ zhes zer tha
232b1(nyi khri): zhes bdud kyi lam mi ston/ bdud kyi nyes pa 'i stor pa 'di ni rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs par rig par bya'o//
232b2(nyi khri): rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig to can dag sangs rgyas kyi cha byang du byas nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du phyir te/ nyan thos
232b3(nyi khri): dang ldan pa'i mdo// dbyangs kyis bskrad pa dang / lung bstan pa dang / tshigs su bcad pa dang / ched du brjod pa dang / gling bzhi dang / de ltar bu byung ba
232b4(nyi khri): dang skyes pa'i ribs dang / shin tu rgyas pa dang / chos rmad du byung du ba dang / rtogs par brjod pa dang / gtan la bab par bstan pa dag bstan to// 'grel
232b5(nyi khri): rnam par 'byed do// gsal bar byed do// yongs su ston te zhes bdud kyi las rnam pa 'di lta bu dag mi smra mi stor pa ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
232b6(nyi khri): chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs par rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig to can dag sangs rgyas kyi cha byad du byas shing / byang chub sems dpa'
232b7(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen po'i drung du phyin te 'di skad rigs kyi bu khyod la ni byang chub kyi sems kyang cung zad kyang med khyod ni phyir mi ldog pa yang ma yin khyod ni bla med pa
233a1(nyi khri): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar yang nus so// zhes zer ba 'di lta bu'i bdud kyi las ngag mi smi mi bstan pa
233a2(nyi khri): ni rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig tocan dag sangs rgyas kyi
233a3(nyi khri): cha byad du byas shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen na po'i drung du phyin te/ 'di skad du rigs kyi bu mig ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // rnab
233a4(nyi khri): dang sna dang / lce dang lus dang / yang ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // gzugs ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg byang
233a5(nyi khri): chos ni bdag gam bdag gi na stong ngo // mig sa rnam par shes pa ni bdag sa ma bdag gis stong ngo // rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa
233a6(nyi khri): skye'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam pa shes pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // mig gi 'dus te reg pa ni ba gag
233a7(nyi khri): sdong ngo // rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dag/ yang
233a8(nyi khri): 'dus te rig pa bdag gam bdag gis jing // mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni bdag ga ma bdag gis stong ngo // rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i
233b1(nyi khri): gyis tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / yid kyi
233b2(nyi khri): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // tshul khrims kyi pha rol
233b3(nyi khri): tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyis pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu
233b4(nyi khri): phyin pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyi bar du ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
233b5(nyi khri): rnams kyi bar du bdag gam bdag gis stong na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ yang ci zhig
233b6(nyi khri): bya zhes zer ba de lta bu'i bdud kyi las ngag mi smra mi ston pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o//
233b7(nyi khri): rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig tocan dag sangs rgyas kyi cha byang du byas shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du phyin te/ 'dis
234a1(nyi khri): du rigs kyi bu shar phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos rnams kyis stong ste/
234a2(nyi khri): 'di la sangs rgyas zhes bya bar yang med do// byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba yang med do// nyan thos zhes bya ba yang med do// lho dang nub
234a3(nyi khri): dang / byang dang / byang shar dang / shar lho dang / lho nu ba dang / nub byang dang / 'og dang / steng gi phyogs bcu kun kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang /
234a4(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos rnams kyis stong ste/ 'di la sangs rgyas zhes bya ba yang med do// byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba
234a5(nyi khri): yang meng ngo // nyan thos zhes bya ba yang med // zhes bya ba yang med do zhes zer ba 'di lta bu'i bdud kyi las ngag mi smra mi ston pa 'di ni byang chub
234a6(nyi khri): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs par rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig ton na dag/ nyan thos kyim byang
234a7(nyi khri): du byas shing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du phyin te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba las zlog
234b1(nyi khri): nga/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya bas 'dems pa dang / rjes su ston pa de lta bu'i bdud tsams dag ma sgo ma ston pa 'dzan
234b2(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen tham ldog pa'i grogs pa'i rig par drun// rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig tonar dag mkhan
234b3(nyi khri): be dang skyo ba dpon rdzo cha byang du byas shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dring du phun te/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la
234b4(nyi khri): bzlog cing / rnam pa thams cang mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas bzlan hU~M/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la spyod pa dang
234b5(nyi khri): yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yang log rnam
234b6(nyi khri): dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la sbyor ba/ stong ba ting dang / mtshar ma med pa nga / smo med pa'i bar gyi chos rnams
234b7(nyi khri): la sbyor zhing de ltar rigs kyi bu khyod kyis chos de dag yongs bsgoms la nyan thos kyis mdzod du myos zhig bla ma med pa
235a1(nyi khri): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi khyod la ci zhig bya zhes zer ba de lta bu'i bdud kyi las ngag mi smra mi ston pa 'ang ni/ byang chubu mes dpa' sem
235a2(nyi khri): dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs par rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud srog can dag ma'i cha byang du byas shing / byang chub sems
235a3(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du phyin te/ 'di skad du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngor par sangs rgyas pas khyod la ci zhig bya/
235a4(nyi khri): de'i don du ri bskal pa tshang med grangs med par 'khor zhing rkang lag dang mgo bcad pa dang tshad med pas nyor mongs par 'gyur gyis/ gang la rgyun tu bzhugs
235a5(nyi khri): pa'i 'bras bu mngon du byar yod pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu bangon du byar yod pa dang / phyir mi ldog pa'o 'bras bu mngon du bya
235a6(nyi khri): yod pa dang / dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu mngon du byar yod pa de la brtson par gyis shig ces zer ba de lta bu'i bdud kyi las ngag mi smra ma ston pa 'ang
235a7(nyi khri): / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' rjen tha' ldog pa'i grogs par rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig ton dang gang sa slong
235a8(nyi khri): tsho byad du byas shing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' blo'i drung du byor te/ gzugs merta gces bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stom pa nga
235b1(nyi khri): gzugs sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / zhi ba dang / stong pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smor pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang /
235b2(nyi khri): dber zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya bar ston pa
235b3(nyi khri): dang / rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / zhi ba dang stong pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya
235b4(nyi khri): ba med pa dang / dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / mig mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang //
235b5(nyi khri): zhi bra dang / stong pa dang / mtshan me med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / dben zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stom
235b6(nyi khri): pa dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / zhi ba dang / ston pa dang / mtshan
235b7(nyi khri): ma med pa dang / smod pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / dben zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / gzug mi rtag ces
236a1(nyi khri): bya ba dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / ni ba dang / stong pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon
236a2(nyi khri): par 'du bya ba med pa dang / dper zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i rdul gyis stor pa dang / sku dz+ra dang ro dang reg dang / chos martag ces bya ba dang / snu
236a3(nyi khri): bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / ni ba dang / stong pa dang / mtshan mameng ba dang / smon pa med dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / dber zhes
236a4(nyi khri): bya ba de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / zhi ba
236a5(nyi khri): dang / stong pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / dben zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i gyis chos
236a6(nyi khri): ston pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yi
236a7(nyi khri): rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsal ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / na ba dang / stong ba dang / mtshan ma med pa dang
236a8(nyi khri): mngon par shes 'du ba med pa dang / dper zhes bya bar migs pa'i tshul gyis so dbadang / mig gi 'dus su reg pa me tag ces bya ba nga /
236b1(nyi khri): sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / zhi ba dang / stong pa dang / mtshan me med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang /
236b2(nyi khri): dber zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus
236b3(nyi khri): kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / zhi ba dang / stong pa dang /
236b4(nyi khri): mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / dben zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / mig
236b5(nyi khri): gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba pa mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / khadag med pa dang / zhi ba dang / stong pa dang / mtshan
236b6(nyi khri): ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du ba med pa dang / dben zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg
236b7(nyi khri): pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyer gyis tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
236b8(nyi khri): tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / zhi ba dang / stong pa dang / mtshan ma med
237a1(nyi khri): bdang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / dran pa nye
237a2(nyi khri): gnag pa rnams kyi bar du mi rjes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / ni ba dang / stong pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smod pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med
237a3(nyi khri): pa dang / nga ban+da zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / sangs rgyas kyis ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar du mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag
237a4(nyi khri): med pa dang / zhi ba dang / song pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / dben zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
237a5(nyi khri): smon pa de lta bu'i bdud kyi las kyi rnam par dag pa mi smra mi ston pa 'di re/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig bya'o/
237a6(nyi khri): dri ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sdig pa'i grogasu po dag tu rig par bya ste/ de ltar shes nas kyang yongs su spang bar bya'o//
237a7(nyi khri): shes rab kyi rol phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga po las le'u bdun pa'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
237a8(nyi khri): gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba'i tshig 'di'i don gang lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang /
237b1(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'i tshig gi don med pa ste/ de ci'i
237b2(nyi khri): phyir zhe na/ byang chub kyang ma skyes la sems kyang ma skyes pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor byang chub la yang tshig med/ sems la yang tshig med pas/ de'i phyir byang
237b3(nyi khri): chub sems drapa'i tshig gi don med pa'o// drab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha' la bya'i rjes med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' la
237b4(nyi khri): tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ rmi lam la gnas med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di
237b5(nyi khri): lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma la gnas med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sdig sbrul gnas
237b6(nyi khri): med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ chu zla dang sgra bstan dang / mig g.yor dang gzug
237b7(nyi khri): bstar dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa la gnas med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper
237b8(nyi khri): na/ yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnas med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i
238a1(nyi khri): tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin nyid la gnas med do// ma nor ba'i de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa'i
238a2(nyi khri): bzhin nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings nyid dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid la gnas med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don
238a3(nyi khri): med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i gzugs la gnas med do// tshor ba dang 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa la gnas med
238a4(nyi khri): rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig ga don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dpe
