265a8(nyi khri): bug nan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che mags rab kyi ma tu phyin pa la srung ci kyis dang sa sangs rgya sa nga ldan pa'i yongs bya bas ma yi gyi/ rnam pa can
265b1(nyi khri): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshul khrims yosas su bsrung zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag pa
265b2(nyi khri): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems sa dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//
265b3(nyi khri): dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba
265b4(nyi khri): ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ chos de dag la de la bzod pa la mos shing brten te dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad
265b5(nyi khri): dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
265b6(nyi khri): la spyod pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan
265b7(nyi khri): pa yid la bya bas ma byin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid bya bas/ brtson 'grus kyi nyams dang ldan par byed cing dge ba'i dge rtsa ba de yang sems
265b8(nyi khri): can thams dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes ra/
265b9(nyi khri): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// dang ldan pa r+ya ti'i bu gnan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
265b10(nyi khri): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing / kun thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i ying la bye bas me yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyi dang ldan pas /
265b11(nyi khri): la bya bas/ sems rtse gcig tu byed cing de dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams drang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rtogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs
265b12(nyi khri): su bsngo ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa
265b13(nyi khri): dati'i bu gnan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / chos thams cad la sgyu mar byas pa'i 'dubras nye bar ba
265b14(nyi khri): rten thos dang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la b+hA bas/ shes rab kyi pha rol
265b15(nyi khri): phyin pa la rlom sems su mi byed de/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su
265b16(nyi khri): bsngo ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra da ti'i bums
265b17(nyi khri): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshul khrims yosas su bsrung zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par

265b19(nyi khri): dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba

265b21(nyi khri): dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa

265b23(nyi khri): pa yid la bya bas ma byin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid bya bas/ brtson 'grus kyi nyams dang ldan par byed cing dge ba'i dge rtsa ba de yang sems
265b24(nyi khri): can thams da dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes ra
266a1(nyi khri): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa gar dwa ti'i bu gnan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
266a2(nyi khri): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la snod cing / can thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i ying la bye bas mo yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa thaMng dang ldan pas
266a3(nyi khri): la bya bas/ sems rtse gcig tu byed cing de dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams drang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rtogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs
266a4(nyi khri): su bsngo ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa
266a5(nyi khri): dwa ti'i bu gnan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / chos thams cad la sgyu mar byas pa'i 'dunas bar
266a6(nyi khri): na thos dang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la b+ha bas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
266a7(nyi khri): phyin pa la rlom sems su mi byed de/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su
266a8(nyi khri): bsngo ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyang po'i gas rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shar de ti'i bumam
266b1(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' rnon po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba'i sems kyis pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag dang / sems ca
266b2(nyi khri): dang byang chub la mtshan mar mi byed/ mi dmigs pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug
266b3(nyi khri): gri go na chen po'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de lta bu'i de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa re re la gnas shing pha
266b4(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa drug po thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsams
266b5(nyi khri): dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la yang mnyam par gzhog ste/ bsam gtan dang tshad med pa dang / gzugs med
266b6(nyi khri): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi ro yang myong bar mi byed do// bsam gtan dang tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gis
266b7(nyi khri): kyang mi 'phrogs te/ bsam gtan dang tshad med pa dang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i dbang gis kyang mi skye'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra ti'i bu 'di ni/
266b8(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thabs mkhas pa dang grogs pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang
267a1(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gas med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dag la dben pa mthong ba dang / sto
267a2(nyi khri): pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa/ mthong bas mnyam par gzhog ste/ de dag gi dbang gis kyang mi ste/ yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon tu yang mi byed de/
267a3(nyi khri): nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyang zil gyis gnon te/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
267a4(nyi khri): byin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'i go rgya chen po ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA re dwa ti'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa zhes
267a5(nyi khri): bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar go cha chen po bgos pa la shar phyogs dang / lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / byang
267a6(nyi khri): shar dang / shar lho dang / lho nub dang / nub byang dang / 'og dang steng gi phyogs ri'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bcus
267a7(nyi khri): pa rnams kyang brjod cing yis su sgrogs pa mdzad de/ 'jig rten gyi khams chege mo zhig na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gi che chen po bkris pa 'di
267a8(nyi khri): bu zhig sems can yongs su smin par byed do// sangs rgyas kyi ning yongs su dag par byed pa// rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par rtse ba'i nas sgra brjod par mdzad cing dbyangs rdza
267b1(nyi khri): sngags so// smras pa ni dang ldan pa gang po ji tsam gyis ma/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la yang dag par zhugs shes zla/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
267b2(nyi khri): dpa' chen po theg pa chen po ni gang yin gang pos smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la shi byang chub sems dpa' seMs dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug la
267b3(nyi khri): spyod de/ de sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing 'dod pas dben/ sdig to mi dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa rtog pa dang bcas pa dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang //
267b4(nyi khri): bde ba can bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de bzhin du bsam gtan gnyis pa dang / gsum pa dang / gzhi pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnaso//
267b5(nyi khri): de byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa mi gnyis tshad med pa gcugs pa med pa/ gnod pa med pa ltong pa med pa yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin
267b6(nyi khri): tu bsgoms paste/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klags pa/ na mkha'i mthas gtugs pa phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par ba
267b7(nyi khri): sdod do// de snying rje dang ldan pa dang dga' ba dang ldan pa dang / gtang snyoms dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa mi gnyis pa tshad med pa/ bcugs
267b8(nyi khri): pa med pa/ gnod pa med pa/ lhod pa med pa/ de yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin tu bsgoms pa/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings klas pa/ na mkha'i mtha' gdugs
268a1(nyi khri): pa phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do// de tshang med pa 'di dag dang / gzugs med pa 'di dag la nam
268a2(nyi khri): rnam pa dang / tshul dang mtshan mas mnyam par gnog cing rnam par ldang ba'i tshe yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa
268a3(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen po'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu
268a4(nyi khri): phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa'i bu de ltar na
268a5(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' rnon po theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs par zhes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
268a6(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang ldan pa'i shin tu yangs pa mi gnyis pa tshad med pa gcugs pa med pa/ gnod pa med pa lhod pa med pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa shin tu
268a7(nyi khri): bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyi klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par stod /
268a8(nyi khri): sbeng rje dang ldan pa dang / dga' ba dang ldan pa dang btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa mi gnyis pa tshad med pa/ bcugs pa med pa/ ban
268b1(nyi khri): med pa/ stod pa med pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin tu bsnams pas/ 'jig rten rjes kyi dbyengs kyigs pa/ rnamakha'i mangs gtugs bzugs
268b2(nyi khri): brgya rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing / rnam par spyod do// de 'dod pas dbyen sdig to mi dge ba'i rlom kyi dben pa dang bcas dpyong pa dang bcas pa
268b3(nyi khri): pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba can busam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de bzhin du bsam gtan gnyis pa dang / gsum
268b4(nyi khri): pa dang / bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// nam mkha' mtha' bas skye mched dang / rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang / cung zad med pa'i
268b5(nyi khri): skye mched dang / 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// 'di byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ting nge 'dzin te/
268b6(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de rnam pa ba thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems snying rje chen po sngon tu 'gro bas/ nyon mongs pa rab tu sbyang
268b7(nyi khri): pa'i phyir/ bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gzhan le brjod cing / 'chang pa dang / ston ci
268b8(nyi khri): 'brel pa la rnam par 'jed cing bsal bar byed de/ de dag gi ro dang de dag gi skyon dang / 'byung ba yang tshul yang bzhin du ston pa 'di ni byang chub sems
269a1(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
269a2(nyi khri): nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba de dag gis bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag la mnyam par gnog cing rnam par
269a3(nyi khri): yang 'di lta ste/ na thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyis sems sam/ sems bskyed pa gnan gyi go ma 'byed pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa
269a4(nyi khri): chen po'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam pa'o// de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid
269a5(nyi khri): la bya bas/ bsam gtan dang / chad pa dang / gzugs meng pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dag gis rnam par spyod pa'i tshe 'di snyam ste/ sems can tham
269a6(nyi khri): cad kyi nyon mongs pa zad par bya ba'i phyir chos ston to// snyam du sems shing yid la bya ba de dag la bzod pa dang mos pa dang / rtog pa dang sems kyis khong du na
269a7(nyi khri): par byed pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i pha rol du phyin pa'o// nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad ma
269a8(nyi khri): panyid dang ldan pa'i yings bya bas/ bsam gtan dang/ tshad med pa dang / gzugs meng pa'i rnams par 'jug pa de dag gis rnam par myong pa'i ma
269b1(nyi khri): can thams cad kyi don dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi phyir brtson 'grus mnyam par mi byed pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bcom
269b2(nyi khri): 'grus pha rol tu phyin pa'o// nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ bsam gtan
269b3(nyi khri): dang / tshad med pa dang / rnam par thur pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la mnyam par gzhog cing rnam par ldang yang nyan thos sam
269b4(nyi khri): rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ltung ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// nam byang chub sems dpa' sems
269b5(nyi khri): dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ bsam gtan dang po'i yan lag dang / bsam gtan gnyis pa dang / bsam
269b6(nyi khri): gtan gsum pa dang / bzhi pa'i yan lag dang / bsam gtan bas pa'i yan lag mi rtag pa'i rnam pa dang / sdug bsngal ba'i rnam pa dang / bdag
269b7(nyi khri): med pa'i rnam pa'i rnam pa dang / zhi ba'i rnam pa dang / stong pa'i rnam pa dang / mtshan ma myed pa'i rnam pa dang / smon pa med pa med pa'i rnam par rab tu rtog kyang
269b8(nyi khri): bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag mi dmigs shing de dag gis rlom sems su mi byed pa 'di ni byang chub sems
270a1(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyid pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra da ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
270a2(nyi khri): sa rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod theg pa chen po'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa'i rnam pa thams
270a3(nyi khri): mkhyen pa nyid du byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun bsgoms pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / gzugs
270a4(nyi khri): med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa rnams dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang
270a5(nyi khri): smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs
270a6(nyi khri): pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams bsgom pa dang / rnam pa thams
270a7(nyi khri): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar tu bsgoms pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'dir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o// tshe dang ldan pa
270a8(nyi khri): da ti'i bu gnan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par gnog cing / bdag gis sems can thams cad yongasu bsgyu
270b1(nyi khri): bya'o/ zhes de la gnol bar byed do// snying rje'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par gnog cing / sems can rnams la snying rje ba dang / snying rtse ba'i nyams su byed do// dpa' ba'i tshing
270b2(nyi khri): nge 'dzin la mnyam par gnog cing bdag nyid kyis sems can thams cad dgrol bar bya'o// zhes sems can rnams la sems so// btang snyoms kyi ting nge 'dzin la
270b3(nyi khri): mnyam par gzhog cing sems can gyi zag pa zad par bya'o la rab tu gzhog par byed do// 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa'i pha
270b4(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa'o// nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa rnams kyi rnam pa dang / tshul dang mtshan ma la mnyam par gzhog cing
270b5(nyi khri): rnam par ldang yang rnam thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du bsngo ba ma gtogs par nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su mi bsngo ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'
270b6(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su ma nyams pa'o// nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
270b7(nyi khri): bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gis ma 'dres par rnam par spyod cing / sa gnyis po nyan thos kyi sa 'am/
270b8(nyi khri): rang sangs rgyas kyi sar 'dong ba mi skyed kyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mos shing dga' ba 'di ni byang ba sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa rnam
271a1(nyi khri): la spyod pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
271a2(nyi khri): sems bskyed pas mi dge ba'i chos rnams rab tu spangs pa dang / dge ba phun sum tshogs par bya ba'i don tu brtson 'grus mi btong bas rnam par spyod pa 'di ni/ byang
271a3(nyi khri): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsams
271a4(nyi khri): dang tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa 'di la yang mnyam par gzhog la/ bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms
271a5(nyi khri): par 'jug pa'i dbang gi kyang mi skye zhing / de dag gis ro yang mong bar byed pa yang med la/ de dag gis 'phrogs par yang mi 'gyur ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa
271a6(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
271a7(nyi khri): nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas bsam gtan dang / nad med dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag la yang mnyam par gnog cing rnam par ldang la
271a8(nyi khri): de dag la mi rtag pa'i rnam pa dang / sdug bsngal ba'i rnam pa dang / bdag med pa'i rnam pa dang / ni ba'i jam pa dang / stong pa'i rnam pa dang / smon pa med pa'i rnams
271b1(nyi khri): rab tu rtog kyang nyan thos dang / ra sangs rgyas kyi skyon med par yang 'jug par mi byed pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu
271b2(nyi khri): phyin pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems
271b3(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni nang stong pa nyid shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yin/ phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med
271b4(nyi khri): pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg
271b5(nyi khri): pa chen po'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thog pa chen po ni chos thams cad la sems rnam par mi 'khrug cing /
271b6(nyi khri): mnyam par gzhag par shes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu
271b7(nyi khri): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni rtog ces bya bar shes pa mi 'jug pa mi rtag pa dang / bde ba dang / bsdug bsngal ba dang /
271b8(nyi khri): bdag dang bdag med pa dang / sdug pa dang mi sdug pa ces bya bar shes pa mi 'jug pas/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni de mi dmigs pa'i tshul du byang chub
272a1(nyi khri): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o// tshe dang ldan pa ra da ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
272a2(nyi khri): pa chen po ni 'dod pa'i khams su shes pa 'jug par mi byed/ gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i khams su shes par 'jug par mi byed pa 'dod pa dang / gzugs dang
272a3(nyi khri): med pa'i khams mishes yang med pa ste/ tsho nga ldan pa ka na ti'i bu 'di nang na yang mau migs pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rig pa
272a4(nyi khri): po'i tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos la yang
272a5(nyi khri): shes pa mi 'jug par mi byung / gzag pa dang bcas pa dang zag pa med pa dang / 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyis chos rnams kyang mi shes pa med pa ste/ che
272a6(nyi khri): dang ldan pa sha ri dwa ti'i bu 'di yang de mi dmigs pa'i tshul du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la theg pa chen po la gnas shes bya/ gang pos smras pa
272a7(nyi khri): tshe dang ldan rang ti'i shA sa byung chub sems dpa' seng song pa' chen gyi ra rabakyi pa sa tu phyin la snang pa 'in/ sbyin pa dalas tu sbyin bra la yang dag pa sa
272a8(nyi khri): kyang sa sbyin pa yang ma ngogs gyun pa'i pha rom tu phyin pa yang mi dmigs byang chub sems dpa'i yang ma migs/ len pa yong me dmigs/
272b1(nyi khri): byed pa de dag kyang mi dmigs te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gnas
272b2(nyi khri): zhes bya'o// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin
272b3(nyi khri): pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gnas kyang nges dge ba'i chos kyang mi dmigs/ mi dge
272b4(nyi khri): ba dang 'jig rten las 'das pa dang / 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas dang / zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa'i chos kyang mi dmigs shing shes
272b5(nyi khri): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang mi dmigs/ yid la byang chub sems dpa' yang mi dmigs/ yid la bya ba de dag kyang mi dmigs te/ de ltar na byang chub sems
272b6(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi dmigs/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang mi dmigs/ yid la bya ba mi dag kyang mi dmigs te/
272b7(nyi khri): ldan byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gnas pa tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu
272b8(nyi khri): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i
273a1(nyi khri): don du mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid bsgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yeng la bya ba ma 'dres pas
273a2(nyi khri): bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phye stong pa nyid bsgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid le bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam
273a3(nyi khri): par bsgom pa'i don du dri mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid bsgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa cid dang ldan pa'i yad la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom
273a4(nyi khri): pa ni rnam par bsgom pa'i don du mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bsgom mo// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems
273a5(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
273a6(nyi khri): byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams bsgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i di du
273a7(nyi khri): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams bsgom mo// 'phags de'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / chad med pa rnams
273a8(nyi khri): dang / gzugs med pa'i rnams par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par tha ba brgyad dang / mithar gyis gnas pa'i sems 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam me
273b1(nyi khri): dang smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin pa sgom ma// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'ing dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i dor dung mi dmigs tshul gyis
273b2(nyi khri): mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams bsgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas
273b3(nyi khri): bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis de banan gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa ban dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang
273b4(nyi khri): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad bsgom mo// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la yang dag par gnas shes
273b5(nyi khri): bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' dmigs su med pa'i phyir 'di lta ste/
273b6(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'dir tha skad tsam du zad do zhes bya bar shes so// gzugs dmigs su med pa'i phyir gzugs shes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad /
273b7(nyi khri): tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par nus pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba 'di ni mong tsam du zad do// skye mched dang khams
273b8(nyi khri): dang rter cing 'brel par 'byung ba dmigs su med pa'i phyir rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad ngo // sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs su med/
274a1(nyi khri): pa'i phyir sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam zad do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / ba
274a2(nyi khri): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyir pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba 'di
274a3(nyi khri): ni ming du zad do// nang stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir rang stong pa nyid ni ming tsam du zad do// phyi stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ phyi nang stong pa nyid ces bya ba
274a4(nyi khri): na ming tsam du zad do// phyi nang stong pa nyid dmigs su med phyir/ phyi nang stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi bar du dmigs su med pa'i
274a5(nyi khri): phyir dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams shes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnam
274a6(nyi khri): dang bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa rnams dang / mthar gyis gnas pa
274a7(nyi khri): snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs
274a8(nyi khri): kye sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu nga/ mi 'jigs pa bani dang / sa sa yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dmin
274b1(nyi khri): su med pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ces bya bar 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// de bzhin gshegs pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir de bzhin nyid ces bya ba
274b2(nyi khri): 'dri ni ming tsam du zad do// ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med
274b3(nyi khri): pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' gnyis su med pa'i phyir yang dag pa'i mtha' zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// byang chub dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ byang chub ces
274b4(nyi khri): bya ba 'drin ming tsam du zad do// sangs rgyas dmigs su med pa'i sangs rgyas shes bya ba 'di yang ming tsam du zad do// zhes bya bar yang dag par shes te/ tshe dang ldan pa
274b5(nyi khri): shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' bo la yang dag par gnas shes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa
274b6(nyi khri): chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas snying po byang chub la 'dug gi bar du mngon par shes pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byas shing / sems can yongs su smin par byed
274b7(nyi khri): do// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa dang / rim gro bya ba'i tshul gang 'ongs pa de dag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la rim gro bya ba dang / bkur
274b8(nyi khri): stir bya ba dang / bsti stang du bye ba dang / mchod pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi ning nas sangs rgyas kyi ning du 'gro'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las kyang 'di lta ste/
275a1(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa'i thog pa 'di nyid kyi chos nyidang // dbyung chub sems dpa'i theg pa de la gnas te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs
275a2(nyi khri): rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro zhing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed/ sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed kyang / de la sangs rgyas kyi nang gi 'du shes kyang mi
275a3(nyi khri): 'byung / sangs rgyas kyi 'du shes kyang mi 'byung // sangs rgyas kyi 'du shes kyang mi 'byung / de gnyis su med pa'i sa la gnas shing / lus ji lta bu sems
275a4(nyi khri): can rnams kyi don du bya ba'i mthu yod pa de lta bu lus ched du bsam shing yongs su 'dzin to// de nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob par 'gyur gyi bar du theg
275a5(nyi khri): pa de yang nam du yang mi 'bral te/ des rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes thob nas kyang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / lha dang k+Sha dang /
275a6(nyi khri): gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten
275a7(nyi khri): bskor bar mi nus pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ro// de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas nas shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten
275a8(nyi khri): gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das zhugs pa rnams yon tan brjod pa mdzad cing 'jig rten gyi khams/ che ge mo zhig tu
275b1(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po bla na med pa'i theg pa'i mchog la gnas pa 'di shes bya ba zhig gnas pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob sa/
275b2(nyi khri): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa thob nas kyang chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar byed do// zhes grags pa sgrogs cing dbyangs su brjod pa mdzad do// lho dang / nub dang /
275b3(nyi khri): byad dang / byang shar dang / shar lho dang / lho nub dang / nub byang dang / 'og dang / steng gi phyogs kyi phyogs re re zhing 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung
275b4(nyi khri): gi bye ma snyed dag ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa yon tan brjod pa mdzad cing 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag ni/ sangs
275b5(nyi khri): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs pa yon tan brjod pa mdzad cing 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa
275b6(nyi khri): chen po bla na med pa yang dag pa mchog la gnas pa 'di zhes bya ba zhig rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyer pa nyid nas kyang chos kyi
275b7(nyi khri): 'khor lo bskor bar byed do zhes grags pa sgrog cing dbyangs su brjod pa mdzad do// de ltar tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
275b8(nyi khri): chen po zag pa chen po la yang dag par gnas shes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'dzin ces gsol to// bcom ldan
276a1(nyi khri): 'das gon chen po bgos so// go ma chen po bgos so zhes bgyi ba na/ bcom ldan 'das ji tsam du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
276a2(nyi khri): chen po bgos shes bgyi ba lags/ de skad nas gsol pa dang / bracom ldan 'das kyis rme nga ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems
276a3(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po lhag pa rten po'i gan byin cing 'di lnga ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ge me thags/ rgyal khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
276a4(nyi khri): dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gocha bsas/ nang stong pa nyid kyi gocha bgos/
276a5(nyi khri): stong pa nyid kyi ga cha bgos byi nang stong pa nyid kyi go cha chen po bgos/ dngos po meng nga'i ngo ba nyid stong pa cid kyi bar gyi go chu bgos/ dran panye bar gnag pa'i gocha bgos/
276a6(nyi khri): dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam gyi gocha bgos/ 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsdam
276a7(nyi khri): gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ti
276a8(nyi khri): 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
276b1(nyi khri): brgyad kyi go cha bgos/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi go mgos/ sangs rgyas kyi sku'i go cha bgos/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rter gyi khams 'di sdang
276b2(nyi khri): bas rgyas bkang ste/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang bas rgyas par 'gengs so// lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs
276b3(nyi khri): dang / byang shar dang / shar lho dang / lho nub dang / nub byang dang / 'og dang / steng gi phyogs re re zhing 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma bye steng snang bas rgyas
276b4(nyi khri): par 'gengs so// sdong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu rab tu spyod do// shar phyogs pa kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed rab
276b5(nyi khri): pa drug tu spyod do// lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang / shar lho dang / lho nub dang / nub byang dang / 'og dang / steng gi phyogs kyi phyogs
276b6(nyi khri): re re zhing 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnam pa drug tu rab tu spyod do// des stod gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di ni sems can dmyal ba'i mi'i
276b7(nyi khri): phung po ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad med par byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la phyag 'tshal lo// zhes bya
276b8(nyi khri): ba'i sgra brjod do dbyangs sgrog go// de'i sems can dmyal ba'i sems can de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas/ dga' ba dang bde ba thob ste/ de dga' ba
277a1(nyi khri): dang / bde ba des sems can dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par ldang ba// de dag sems can dpral ba de dag ngas rnam par langs nas sangs rgyas kyi ning ga
277a2(nyi khri): dang gdun/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba des darag tu smra'o// de bzhin du byol song gi skye gnas pa'i sems can rnams dang / gci
277a3(nyi khri): rje'i 'jig rten pa'i sems can de dag rnam par ldang ngo // de dag rgyal seng ge skye gnas dang / gzhin rje'i 'jig rten de dag nas rnam par langs nas/ sangs rgyas m+b+ha zhing gang
277a4(nyi khri): dang gang nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho snang bar da rab tu dz+nyAni/ rab 'byor 'di sa ste dper ma sgyu ba'i mkhan po'am/ sgyu ma'i mkha
277a5(nyi khri): po'i mtshan bu mkhas pa zhig gis lem po che'i 'ban 'dir 'dug ste skye bo mang po tshogs kyi mdun du sems can dmyal ba dang / rtsol song gi skye gnas dang / gaushin d+he'i
277a6(nyi khri): 'dog can dag cig mngon par sprul la/ de ltar mngon par sprul nas/ ngan song gi sems can dag la sangs rgyas kyi snang / rjesak+Sh+ma s+thA dang / dge 'dun gyi
277a7(nyi khri): gas par 'gyur te/ deces sprul pa de dag sangs rgyas kyi skye rjes kyi sgra dang dge 'dun gi spangs sems ca dmyal ba dang / sgrol song gi skye gnas dang /
277a8(nyi khri): rje'i 'jig rten de dag nas rnam par langs par gyur nas/ rab 'byor de la rngo sam du sems/ sgyu ma'i mkhang po dang / sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mtshan busangs sems
277b1(nyi khri): can dmyal ba dang / byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten des rnam par spang ba yod dam gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa
277b2(nyi khri): rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med grangs med pa'i sems can rnams ngan song gsum las
277b3(nyi khri): yongs su bkrol yang bar byas pa med do// de ci'i phyir ne na/ rab 'byor sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar gzung ma/ chos rnams kyi chos nyid kyis de bzhin
277b4(nyi khri): gshegs pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos shes bya'o// rab 'byor gzhur yang byung
277b5(nyi khri): nub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ go cha chen po bgos pa ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi
277b6(nyi khri): khams bai DUr+ya rgyu las byung ba mngon parasprul pa byed do// de ltar de baiDUr+ya'i rgyu las byung ba mngon par sprul nas
277b7(nyi khri): 'khor los bsgyur ba'i sra pa mngon par sprul pa byed do// de ltar 'khor lo bskor ba'i srid pa mngon par sprul nas
277b8(nyi khri): skom 'dod/ rnams la bas zas 'dod pa rnams la zas kyi sbyin pa byed do// skom 'dod pa rnams la bskom/ gnon pa 'dod pa rnams la
278a1(nyi khri): ba gos 'dod pa rnams lags/ me tog 'dod pa rnams la me'aphreng ba 'dod pa rnams la 'byung ba
278a2(nyi khri): spos 'dod pa rnams la spos/ byug pa 'dod pa rnams la byug pa/ malan 'dod pa rnam la ma laH/ khyim 'dod pa rnams la khyir
278a3(nyi khri): 'tshe ba rnams la 'tshe ba yo byed pa rnams la yo byad/ nad kyi rkyen dri 'dod pa rnams dang / yo byad 'dod pa rnams la rkyen rtsi dang po
278a4(nyi khri): byad kyi sbyin pa byed do/ nor bu dang mu tig dang baiDUr+ya dang / man shel dang / b+hu ru dang gsar dngul 'dod pa rnams la nor bu dang /
278a5(nyi khri): mu tig dang / ma baiDUr+ya dang dung dang man shel dang / byu ru dang gau ser dngul gyi sbyin pa byed cing / mi'i yo byad gang tsaM yang rung ba'i bar du sbyin par byed
278a6(nyi khri): des de ltar zas 'dod pa rnams la zas sbyin/ mi yi yo byad gang ci yang rung ba'i bar du byin nas/ sems can de dag la 'di lta ste/ pha rol tu
278a7(nyi khri): byin pa drug dang ldan pa'i chos bstan pa 'di cing chos ston to// sems can de dag gis kyang chos bstan pa 'di rjes nas bla na meng pa yang dag pa
278a8(nyi khri): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sangs rgyas kyi bar du pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i ma
278b1(nyi khri): po 'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mtshan bu mkhas pa zhig gis la ma po che'i ba ni mdor 'dug pa ste/ skye bo mang po'i tshogs kyi mdun du skye bo'i tshogs
278b2(nyi khri): shig mngon par sprul te/ zas 'dod pa la zas byin/ mi'i yo byad gang ci yang rung ba'i bar du byed na/ rab 'byor de la 'di snyam du sems/ sgyu ma'i
278b3(nyi khri): mkhan po 'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mtshan bu des sems can gang la yang ci la yang byin pa yod dam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchiso//
278b4(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'khor lo sgyur ba'i srid mngon par sprul te
278b5(nyi khri): zas 'dod pa rnams la zas byin/ mi'i yo byad gang ci yang rung ba'i bar du byin yang / sems can gang la yang byin pa med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/
278b6(nyi khri): rab 'byor de ni sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar gzung ma/ chos rnams kyi chos nyid kyis de bzhin pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa
278b7(nyi khri): chen po'i go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gan
278b8(nyi khri): shing mched du bsams/ skye ba yongs su gzung bas 'khor lo bsgyur ba'i rigasu skye zhing de 'khor lo bsgyur ba'i dbang phyug de la gnas nas/ sems
279a1(nyi khri): can rnams dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnamasul rab tu zadang// bsam gtan pa ni dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i
279a2(nyi khri): snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa ny+dza dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang /
279a3(nyi khri): rnam par mthar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bani dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad
279a4(nyi khri): dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bani dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la sems
279a5(nyi khri): can rnams rab tu 'grod do// de sems can de dag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas par ma gyur gyi bar du chos bstan pa de dang
279a6(nyi khri): rnam yang 'bru khar mi 'gyur ro// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mnan bu mkhas pa zhig gis lam po che'i bani ma
279a7(nyi khri): 'dug ste/ skye bo mang po'i tshigs kyi mdun du skye bo mang po'i tshogs shig mngon par sprul te/ sems can de dag dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod dam/ sa
279a8(nyi khri): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa ban rgyad bkod na/ rab 'byor de la ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mtshan bu mkhas pa des/ sems
279b1(nyi khri): can+da gang yang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod pa yod dam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar la bkod pa yod dam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das
279b2(nyi khri): de ni ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can tshad med grangs med
279b3(nyi khri): dge ba bcu'i lus kyi lam la rab tu bgrod de/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar la bkod kyang / sems can gang yang de dag la bkod pa medo/
279b4(nyi khri): rab 'byor de ci'i phyir na/ de ni sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na/ chos rnams kyi chos nyid kyis de bzhin pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa'
279b5(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos shes bya'o// // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa//
279b6(nyi khri): bam po bco lnga pa'o// / rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ sems
279b7(nyi khri): can thams cad la bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor zhing rab tu bkod do// rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin
279b8(nyi khri): pa la gnas shing / sems can thams cad bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i lam la sbyor zhing rab tu 'god pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems
280a1(nyi khri): dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ brgya la sems can thams cad dag la rdo dang dbyig pas rdeg cing mtshon gyis
280a2(nyi khri): kyang de la bdag gis 'jug pa'i sems 'ga' tsam yang bskyed par mi bya'o zhes go na gyon cing / sems canathams cad kyang bzadang ba de 'dra ba la rab tu 'god do//
280a3(nyi khri): rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i mkhar po'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhar po'i mnar bu mkhas pa zhig gis lam po che'i ba ni mdor 'dug skye bo mang po'i tshogs kyi 'dun
280a4(nyi khri): du skye bo mang po'i tshogs shig mngon par sprul te/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yang rab tu 'god pa byas ma/ rab 'byor de la ji lta ba snyam du sems
280a5(nyi khri): sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mtshan bu mkhas pa des/ sems can gang la yang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod pa yod dam/ gsol pa bcom
280a6(nyi khri): ldan 'das de ni ma mchis// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can tshad med
280a7(nyi khri): grangs med pa bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod kyang / sems can gang yang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni sgyu ma'i
280a8(nyi khri): chos nyid nye bar gzung na/ chos rnams kyi chos nyid kyis de bzhin pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni go mchen po
280b1(nyi khri): bgos zhes bya'o// rab 'byor gnan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / sems can thams
280b2(nyi khri): nAd la brtson grus kyi pha rol/ phyin pa la yang dag par bskul zhing gnag go 'grod do// rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus
280b3(nyi khri): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / sems can thams cad brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par bskul ba dang / gnog cing 'god pa yin nam
280b4(nyi khri): rab 'byor 'od la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pas/ sems can thams cad lus
280b5(nyi khri): dang sems kyi bdun 'grus la yang dag par bskul zhing gnog go 'god do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i ma
280b6(nyi khri): bu mkhas pa zhig gis lam po ni'i bzhi mdor 'dug ste/ skye bo'i tshogs kyi mdun du skye bo mang po'i tshogs shing mngon par sprul te/ lus dang sems kyi brtson
280b7(nyi khri): 'grus la bkod ma/ rab 'byor de la ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/ snga ma'i mkhan po'i mnan bu des sems can gang yang lus dang sems
280b8(nyi khri): kyi brtson 'grus la bkod pa yang dam/ gsal pa bcom ldan 'das den mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bcon du
281a1(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can tshad med grangs med pa/ lus dang sems kyi brtson 'grus la bkod kyang /
281a2(nyi khri): sems can gang yang lus dang sems kyi brtson 'grus la bkod pa med do// de ci'i phyir ce na/ rab 'byor de ni sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na/ chos rnams kyi
281a3(nyi khri): chos nyid kyis de bzhin pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gon chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o// rab 'byor gnan yang
281a4(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' sems chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / sems can thams cad bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang
281a5(nyi khri): dag par skul zhing gzhog go 'god de// rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te
281a6(nyi khri): sems can thams cad bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par bskul ba dang / gnog cing 'god pa yin nan/ rab 'byor 'di la bya
281a7(nyi khri): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi chos cad la gnas shing chos gang la yang 'khrug pa med par yang dag par rjes su mi mdzangs/ bas
281a8(nyi khri): gas kyi sa phyi pa la gdas pa ya ring dumam ca mas bas pag kyi ba sa rgya pa la yang ga par 'phrul ba
281b1(nyi khri): pa na dgod par byed do// de ltar na yang dag par skul ba rnams kyang nam bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par ma gyur
281b2(nyi khri): gyi bar du nam yang bsam kun gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar mi 'gyur ro// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/ sgyu ma'i ma
281b3(nyi khri): po'i maN+Dan bu mkhas pa nig gis lam po che'i bzhi mdor 'dug ste/ skye bo mang po'i tshogs mdun du skye bo mang po'i tshogs shing mngon par sprul te/ ba
281b4(nyi khri): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod na/ rab 'byor 'di la ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mtshan bu nges
281b5(nyi khri): sems can gang yang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod dam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis
281b6(nyi khri): bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can thams cad bsam gtan gyi
281b7(nyi khri): pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod kyang // sems can thams cad gang yang bsam gtan gyi la tu phyin pa la bkod pa med do// de ci'i phyir nen/
281b8(nyi khri): rabang kyang ngos su mas sa pa badz+rarnams kyi che gyis pa rab 'chung sa pa rgyang
282a1(nyi khri): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rigo cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o// rab 'byor gcan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
282a2(nyi khri): tu phyin pa la gnas shing / sems can thams cad shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par skul zhing gzhog go 'god do// rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sem
282a3(nyi khri): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / sems can thams cad shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par skul ba dang / gzhog cing 'god pa yin zhe na/ ra
282a4(nyi khri): 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos gang yang skye ba 'am 'gag pa 'am/ kun nas nyon mongs pa 'am/
282a5(nyi khri): rnam par byang ba 'am/ tshul rol tam pha rol du dmigs te/ rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa yin
282a6(nyi khri): te/ de de bzhin du sems can thams cad shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par skul zhing gnog go 'god do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i mkhan pa la
282a7(nyi khri): sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mtshan bu mkhas pa zhig gis lam po che'i bzhi mdor 'dug ste/ skye bo mang po'i tshogs kyi mdun skye bo mang po'i tshogs shig mngon par sprul
282a8(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par bskul te/ gzhog cing bkodang// rab 'byor de la jimam du sems/ sgyu ma'i mkhan pa'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhanapa mtshan pa
282b1(nyi khri): mkhas pa dem sems can gang yang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la bkod pa yong ngam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
282b2(nyi khri): pa rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can thams cad shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod kyang / sems car gang yang shes
282b3(nyi khri): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod pa med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni sgyu ma'i chos nyid de nye bar bzung na/ chos rnams kyi chos nyid kyis de ba nir ba'i phyir te//
282b4(nyi khri): rab 'byor de lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
282b5(nyi khri): chen po go cha chen po bgos shing / shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu song zhing ji ltar bdag spyir ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa
282b6(nyi khri): de bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi khams de dag na sems can ji snyed cig 'khod pa de dag thams cad kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par bskul zhing gnog po 'tsha
282b7(nyi khri): do ji ltar na bdag tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin ba dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bsam gtar gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
282b8(nyi khri): shes rab kya ma du tshun pa la brnam par 'dzin du/ 'jig rte gyi khamam de ba na mamam sa ma'i med cig 'bang pa dag thams cad tham shes rab kyi ral dutsha
283a1(nyi khri): pa la yang dag par skul zhing gnog go 'gro dang / 'di lta ste/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di nyid kyis chos kyang ston te/ sems can de dag kyang chos de thob nas
283a2(nyi khri): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas kyi bar du pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang nam yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro// lho dang nub dang / byang dang / byang
283a3(nyi khri): shar dang / shar lho dang / nub byang dang / 'og dang steng gi phyogs kyi phyogs re re zhing 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu song zhing / ji ltar bdag sbyin pa'i
283a4(nyi khri): pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar la gnas bde bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams de dag na/ sems can ji snyed cig yod pa der dag thams
283a5(nyi khri): cad kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par skul ni gnog go 'god do// de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
283a6(nyi khri): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par skul zhing gnog go 'god do// 'di lta ste
283a7(nyi khri): pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di nyid kyis chos kyang ston to// sems can de dag kyang chos de thos nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par ma
283a8(nyi khri): rgyas kyi bar du pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gnanam yang 'di lnga ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhar ba
283b1(nyi khri): mtshan bu mkhas pa zhig gis lam po che'i ba ni mdor 'dug ste/ skye bo mang po'i tshogs kyi mdun du skye bo mang po'i tshogs shig mngon par sprul te/ pha rol tu phyin
283b2(nyi khri): pa drug la yang dag par skul zhing zhag ste bgod par gyur na/ rab 'byor de la ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mtshan bu des sems
283b3(nyi khri): can gang yang pha rol tu phyin pa drug la yang dag par skul zhing bzhag ste bkod pa yod dam/ gsal ba bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das
283b4(nyi khri): kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma ji snyed dang
283b5(nyi khri): lho dang nu ba dang / byang dang / byad shar dang / shar lho dang / lho na ba dang / nu ba byang dang / 'og dang steng gi phyogs re re zhing 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye
283b6(nyi khri): ma snyed kyi/ sems can gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams can pha rol tu phyin pa drug la bkod kyang / sems can gang yang pha rol tu phyin pa drug la bkod pa
283b7(nyi khri): med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung ni/ chos rnams kyi chos nyid kyis de bzhin pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sem
283b8(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa ni rnam
284a1(nyi khri): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis rnam par spyod cing / sems bskyed pa gnan gyi go mi byed do// bdag gis sems can 'di snyed cig ni
284a2(nyi khri): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la dgod par bya'o// 'di snyed cig ni dgod par mi bya'o// bdag gis sems can 'di snyed ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i
284a3(nyi khri): pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod par bya'o// 'di snyed cig
284a4(nyi khri): ni dgod par mi bya'o// bdag gis sems can 'di snyed cig ni byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la dgod par bya'o// 'di snyed cig ni dgod par mi bya'o//
284a5(nyi khri): bdag gis sems can 'di snyed cig ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad kyi par la bkod par bya'o// 'di snyed cig ni dgod par mi bya'o// bdag gis
284a6(nyi khri): sems can 'di snyed cig ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dkod par bya'o// 'di skad cig ni dgod par mi b+ha'o// bdag gis sems can 'di snyed cig ni lan
284a7(nyi khri): cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa 'di nyid la dgod par bya'o// 'di snyed cig ni dgod par mi bya'o// bdag gis sems can 'di snyed cig ni
284a8(nyi khri): byang chub la dgod par bya'o// 'di snyed cig ni dgod par mi bya'o// bdag gis sems can 'di snyed cig ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la dgod par bya'o// 'di
284b1(nyi khri): snyed cig ni dgod par mi bya'o// zhes bya bar sems bskyed pa'i go mi 'byed kyi/ de snyam du sems te/ bdag gis sems can chad med grangs pa sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin
284b2(nyi khri): pa la dgod par bya'o// bdag gis sems can tshad med pa tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
284b3(nyi khri): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la dgod par bya'o// rang stong pa nyid la dgod par bya'o// phyi stong pa nyid la dgod par bya'o//
284b4(nyi khri): dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la dgod par bya'o// byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la dgod par bya'o// 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /
284b5(nyi khri): bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzug pa med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par
284b6(nyi khri): 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par mthar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang
284b7(nyi khri): gzungs kyi sgo thams cad la dgod par bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /
284b8(nyi khri): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad la dgod par bya'o// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la dgod par bya'o// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /
285a1(nyi khri): phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras budapa dgra bcom pa nyid la dgod par bya'o// rang byang chub la dgod par bya'o// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa med la dgod par byar/
285a2(nyi khri): zhes bya bar sems bskyed do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mtshan bu mkhas pa zhig gis lam po che'i bzhi mdor 'dug ste/ skye bo
285a3(nyi khri): mang po'i tshogs kyi mdun du skye bo mang po'i tshogs shig mngon par sprul te/ 'di snyam du bdag gis sems can chad med grangs med pa 'di dag pha rol tu phyin pa drug la dgod par
285a4(nyi khri): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la dgod par bya'o// snyam du sems bskyed par gyur na/ rab 'byor de la ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan pa'i
285a5(nyi khri): mtshan bu des sems can gang yang pha rol tu phyin pa drug la dgod par byas pa yod dam/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la dgod par byas pa yod dam/ gsol ba bcom
285a6(nyi khri): ldan 'das de ni ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can chad med grangs med
285a7(nyi khri): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la dgod pas sems bskyed kyang sems can gang gi don du skyed pa med de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor rgyu
285a8(nyi khri): ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na/ chos rnams kyi chos nyid kyis de bzhin pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos
285b1(nyi khri): shes bya'o// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don 'jal te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
285b2(nyi khri): chen pos ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi slad du go cha ma mchis pa'i go cha bgos par rig par bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar gzus
285b3(nyi khri): gzugs kyi stong ngo // tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa rnam par shes pa'i stong ngo // mig mig gis stong ngo // de bzhin du rna ba dang sna dang lce dang lus dang yid
285b4(nyi khri): yid kyis stong ngo // gzugs gzugs kyis spong ngo // A dang dri dang ro dang reg dang / chos ni chos kyis stong ngo // mig gi rnam par shes pa mig gi rnam par shes pas stong ngo // rna
285b5(nyi khri): ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa yid kyi rnam par shes pas stong
285b6(nyi khri): do mig gi 'dus te reg pa mig gi 'dus te reg pas stong ngo // rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang /
285b7(nyi khri): yid kyi 'dus te reg pas stong ngo // mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong ngo // rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
285b8(nyi khri): tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / yid kyi
286a1(nyi khri): / 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong ngo // sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
286a2(nyi khri): stong ngo tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes
286a3(nyi khri): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong ngo // nang stong pa nyid nang stong pa nyid kyis spong ngo // dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo //
286a4(nyi khri): byang chub kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun byang chub kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun gyis stong ngo // 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med
286a5(nyi khri): pa'i snyoms pa'i 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par mthar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med
286a6(nyi khri): pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa dang /
286a7(nyi khri): so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyis spong ngo // bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'/
286a8(nyi khri): yang byang chub sems dpa'i stong ngo // go chen po yang go chen pos spong ngo // bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos go cham
286b1(nyi khri): mchis pa'i go cha bgos par rig par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ rab 'byor ji skad du smras pa bzhin de bzhin no// de de bzhin na
286b2(nyi khri): rab 'byor de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang ma byas/ rnam par ma byas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen popa gang gis don tu go cha chen po ba
286b3(nyi khri): pa'i sems can de dag kyang ma byas/ rnam par ma byas so// mngon par ma byas so// gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
286b4(nyi khri): nyid ma bgyis/ rnam par ma bgyis/ mngon par ma bgyis pa lags/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gang gis don du go cha chen po bgos
286b5(nyi khri): pa'i sems can de dag gis ci'i dri ma bgyis rnam par ma bgyis/ mngon par ma bgyis pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor
286b6(nyi khri): byed pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma byas/ rnam par ma byas mngon par ma byas so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
286b7(nyi khri): chen pos gang gi don du go cha chen po bgos pa'i sems can de dag kyang ma byas rnam par ma byas so// mngon par ma byas so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab
286b8(nyi khri): 'byor 'di ltar gzugs mi byed rnam par mi byed mngon par mi byed do/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa mi byed/ rnam par
287a1(nyi khri): // mi byed do/ rab 'byor mig mi byed rnam par mi byed/ mngon par mi byed do// rna ba dang mA dang lce dang lus dang yid mi byed do// rnam par mi byed mngon par mi bya
287a2(nyi khri): do/ rab 'byor gzugs mi byed pa rnam par mi byed do// b+hU dang dri dang ro dang reg dang chos mi byed rnam par mi byed mngon par mi byed do// rab 'byor mig gi rnam par
287a3(nyi khri): shes pa mi byed rnam par mi byed mngon par mi byed do// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang /
287a4(nyi khri): yid kyi rnam par shes pa mi byed rnam par mi byed mngon par mi byed do// rab 'byor mig gi 'dus te reg pa mi byed rnam par mi byed mngon par mi byed do// rna ba'i 'dus
287a5(nyi khri): te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa mi byed rnam par mi byed mngon par mi byed
287a6(nyi khri): do rab 'byor mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi byed rnam par byed rnam par mi byed mngon par mi byed do// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis chor
287a7(nyi khri): bdang sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / sgo'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyi mtshar bdang / lus kyi 'dus kyi rig pa'i rkyen sa tshar ba dang / ming kyis 'dra/
287a8(nyi khri): te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi byed rnam par mi byed mngon par mi byed do// rab 'byor bdag ni mi byed rnam par mi byed mngon par mi byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/
287b1(nyi khri): de bzhin du mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor sems can ni mi byed rnam par mi byed mngon par mi byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de shin tu mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro// gas
287b2(nyi khri): ba dang skyes bu dang / gang zag dang shed can dang / shed bdag dang byed pa po dang / tshor ba po dang / shes pa po dang / mthong ba po ni mi byed rnam par mi byed mngon par mi byed de/
287b3(nyi khri): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de shin tu mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor rmi lam ni mi byed rnam par mi byed mngon par mi byed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de shin tu mi dmigs pa'i
287b4(nyi khri): phyir ro/ sgyu ma dang sgra snyan dang / mig g.yor dang gzugs brnyan dang / smig spu dang sprul pa ni mi byed rnam par mngon par mi byed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de shin tu mi
287b5(nyi khri): dmigs pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni mi byed rnam par mi byed mngon par mi byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de shin tu mi dmigs pa'i phyiraro
287b6(nyi khri): rab 'byor tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin/
287b7(nyi khri): pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mi byed rnam par mi byed mngon par mi byed// de shin tu mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor nang stong pa nyid mi byed
287b8(nyi khri): rnam par mi byed mngon par mi byed do// rab 'byor dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du mi byed rnam par mi byed mngon par mi byed de/ de ci'i phyir
288a1(nyi khri): zhe na/ de shin tu mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor byang chub kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun ni mi byed rnam par mi byed mngon par mi byed do//
288a2(nyi khri): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de shin tu mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyom par 'jug pa rnam
288a3(nyi khri): dang rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon
288a4(nyi khri): par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i spobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa
288a5(nyi khri): bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad ni mi byed rnam par mi byed mngon par mi byed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de shin tu mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor de
288a6(nyi khri): bzhin mi byed rnam par mi byed mngon par mi byed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de shin tu mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro// ma nor bde ba zhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid da
288a7(nyi khri): chos nyid dang chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings ni mi byed rnam par mi
288a8(nyi khri): byed mngon par mi byed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de shin tu mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor byang chub ni mi byed mngon par mi byed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de shin tu
288b1(nyi khri): mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mi mi byed mngon par mi byed de/ de ci'i phyir che na/ de shin tu mi dmigs pa'i b+hir ro// rab 'byor rnam
288b2(nyi khri): grangs de na 'di ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma byas mngon par ma byas par rig par bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gang gi don du go cha chen po
288b3(nyi khri): bgos pa'i sems can de dag kyang rnam par ma byas mngon par ma byas par rig par bya'o// rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bgos pa na
288b4(nyi khri): go cha med pa'i go cha chen po bgos pa shes bya'o// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das kyis gsung ba'i don 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das gzugs ma bcings ma grol ba'o//
288b5(nyi khri): tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa byams pa gang gi bus/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la
288b6(nyi khri): 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gzugs ma bcings ma grol ba yin nam/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ma bcings ma/
288b7(nyi khri): grol ba yin/ smras pa tshe dang ldan pa gang pos gzugs ni ma bcings ma grol ba yin nam/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ma bcings
288b8(nyi khri): ma grol ba'o// gang pos smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de ltar ma bcings ma grol ba'i gzugs gang yin/ de ltar ma bcings ma grol ba'i tshor ba dang /
289a1(nyi khri): / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa gang yin/ smras pa tshe dang ldan pa gang 'di rmi lam lta bu'i gzugs nim bcings ma grol ba'o//
289a2(nyi khri): gang 'di rmi lam lta bu'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa de ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o// gang 'di sgyum lta bu dang / sgra snyan lta bu dang / mig
289a3(nyi khri): g.yor lta bu dang / gzugs brnyan lta bu dang / smig sgyu lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bu'i gzugs de ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o// gang 'di sprul pa lta bu'i tshor ba
289a4(nyi khri): dang 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / sprul pa lta bu'i rnam par shes pa ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o// tshe dang ldan pa gang po 'das pa'i gzugs ni ma bcings
289a5(nyi khri): ma grol ba'o// 'das pa'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o// tshe dang ldan pa gang po gzugs ni ma
289a6(nyi khri): bcings ma grol ba'o// ma 'ongs pa'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o// tshe dang ldan pa gang po da ltar
289a7(nyi khri): byung ba'i gzugs ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o// da ltar byung ba'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ma bcings ma grol ba'o//
289a8(nyi khri): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa gang po gzugs dbyen pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grol ba'o// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes
289b1(nyi khri): pa med pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grol ba'o// gzugs ma skyes pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grol ba'o// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa
289b2(nyi khri): ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o// tshe dang ldan pa gang po mi dge ba'i gzugs ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o// mi dge ba'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam
289b3(nyi khri): par shes pa ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o// tshe dang ldan pa gang po lung ma bstan pa'i gzugs ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o// lung du ma bstan pa'i tshor ba dang
289b4(nyi khri): 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o// tshe ldan pa gang po 'jig rten pa'i gzugs ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o//
289b5(nyi khri): 'jig rten pa'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o// tshe dang ldan pa gang po 'jig
289b6(nyi khri): rten las 'das pa'i gzugs ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o// 'jig rten las 'das pa'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par
289b7(nyi khri): shes pa ni bcings ma grol ba'o// tshe dang ldan pa gang po zag pa dang / bcas pa'i gzugs ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o// zag pa dang bcas pa'i
289b8(nyi khri): tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o// tshe dang ldan pa gang po de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzugs med
290a1(nyi khri): / pa'i phyir gzugs ma bcings ma grol ba'o// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa med pa'i phyir rnam par shes pa ma bcings ma grol
290a2(nyi khri): ba'o// gzugs dben pa'i phyir gzugs ma bcings ma grol ba'o// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ma bcings ma grol ba'o// gzugs pa skyes pa'i
290a3(nyi khri): phyir gzugs ma bcings ma grol ba'o// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ni ma skyes pa'i phyir rnam par shes pa ma bcings ma grol ba'o// tshe dang ldan
290a4(nyi khri): pa gang po chos thams cad kyang ma bcings ma grol ba'o// med pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grol ba'o// dben pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grol ba'o// ma skyes pa'i phyir ma bcings ma
290a5(nyi khri): bcings ma grol ba'o// tshe dang ldan pa gang po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
290a6(nyi khri): dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtaran gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o// tshe dang ldan pa gang
290a7(nyi khri): med pa'i phyir sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni ma bcings mgrol ba'o// dben pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grol ba'o// ma skyes pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grol ba'o//
290a8(nyi khri): med pa'i phyir tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / btson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin
290b1(nyi khri): pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma bcings ma grol ba'o// dben pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grol ba'o// ma skyes pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grol ba'o// tshe dang ldam
290b2(nyi khri): pa gang po nang stong pa nyid kyang ma bcings ma grol ba'o// phyi stong pa nyid kyang ma bcings ma grol ba'o// phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang ma bcings ma grol ba'o// dngos po med pa
290b3(nyi khri): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar yang ma bcings ma grol ba'o// tshe dang ldan pa gang po med pa'i phyir nang sdong pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba'o// dben pa'i phyir ma bcings ma
290b4(nyi khri): grol ba'o// ma skyes pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grol ba'o// med pa'i phyir phyi stong pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba'o// dben pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grol ba'o// ma skyes
290b5(nyi khri): pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grol ba'o// med pa'i phyir phyi rang spong pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba'o// dben pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grol ba'o// ma skyes pa'i phyir ma bcing
290b6(nyi khri): ma grol ba'o// med pa'i phyir dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar ma bcings ma grol ba'o// dben pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grol ba'o// ma skyes pa'i phyir ma
290b7(nyi khri): bcings ma grol ba'o// tshe dang ldan pa gang po byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun yang ma bcings ma grol ba'o// tshe dang ldan pa gang po med pa'i phyir byang chub
290b8(nyi khri): kyi phyogs kyi chos sum curtsa bdun ma bcings ma grol ba'o// dben pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grol ba'o// ma skyes pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grol ba'o// chad
291a1(nyi khri): ldan pa gang po de bzhin gshegs pa'i skabs sa bcu'i bar dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / bso yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chom ma
291a2(nyi khri): 'dres pa rnams ma bcings ma grol ba'o// tshe dang ldan pa gang po med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ma bcings ma grol ba'o// bden pa'i phyir ma bcings
291a3(nyi khri): ma grol ba'o// ma skyes pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grol ba'o// tshe dang ldan pa gang po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du ma bcings ma grol ba'o// tshe dang ldan
291a4(nyi khri): pa gang po med pa'i phyir rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba'o// bden pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grol ba'o// ma skyes pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grol
291a5(nyi khri): ba'/ tshe dang ldan pa gang po byang chub sems dpa' yang ma bcings ma grol ba'o// tshe dang ldan pa gang po med pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grol ba'o// dben pa'i phyir
291a6(nyi khri): ma bcings ma grol ba'o// ma skyes pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grol ba'o// tshe dang ldan pa gang po de bzhin nyid kyis ma bcings ma grol ba'o// ma nor ba'i de bzhin/
291a7(nyi khri): nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos ston pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' ya
291a8(nyi khri): ma 'ching sa ma tshal ba'o// tshe dang ldan pa gang po med pa'i tsher nyid ni ma bcings ma mam pa'o// dben pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grol ba'o// ma
291b1(nyi khri): ba'i phyir ma bcings ma grol bya'o// med pa'i phyir yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar du ma bcings ma grol ba'o// dben pa'i phyi ma bcings su grol ba'o// ma pa
291b2(nyi khri): phyir ma bcings ma grol ba'o// tshe dang ldan pa gang po 'dus ma byas kyang ma bcings ma grol ba'o// tshe dang ldan pa gang po med pa'i phyir 'dus ma byas mi bcings
291b3(nyi khri): ma grol ba'o// dben pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grol ba'o// ma skyes pa'i phyir mi bcings ma grol ba'o// tshe dang ldan pa gang po byang chub sems dpa' sems
291b4(nyi khri): dpa' chen po rnams kyang ma bcings ma grol ba'o// zhes bya bas chos kyi sgo ste/ de sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma bcings ma grol ba'o// tshul khrims kyi
291b5(nyi khri): pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol
291b6(nyi khri): tu phyin pa ma bcings ma grol ba'o// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du ma bcings ma grol ba'o// byang chub sems dpa' ma bcings ma grol ba'o//
291b7(nyi khri): sangs rgyas ma bcings ma grol ba'o// de bzhin nyid ma bcings ma grol ba'i ma nor ba'i de bzhin nyid dang / gnan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang /
291b8(nyi khri): chos kyi dbyings nyid dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos s+ho na med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' ma bcings ma grol ba'o// 'dus ma byas ma bcings
292a1(nyi khri): ma grol ba'o// dem bcings ma grol ba'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyi ba dang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin padang
292a2(nyi khri): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bcings ma grol ba'o// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar
292a3(nyi khri): la gnas/ ma bcings ma grol ba'i de bzhin nyid la gnas/ ma bcings ma grol ba'i mnor ba de bzhin dang / ma bcings ma grol ba'i gzhan ma yin pa de bzhim nyid
292a4(nyi khri): dang / ma bcings ma grol ba'i chos skyon med pa dang / ma bcings ma grol ba'i yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnas/ ma bcings ma grol ba'i 'dus ma byas la gnas
292a5(nyi khri): te/ ma bcings ma grol ba'i de ma bcings ma grol ba'i sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed do// ma bcings ma grol ba de ma bcings ma grol ba'i sangs rgyas
292a6(nyi khri): kyi ning yongs su dag par byed do// ma bcings ma grol de ma bcings ma grol ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur byed do// ma bcings ma grol
292a7(nyi khri): bdem bcings ma grol ba'i chos mnyan to// ma bcings ma grol ba de ma bcings ma grol ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang nam yang bral ba'i
292a8(nyi khri): 'gyur ro// ma bcings ma grol bde ma bcings ma grol ba'i mngon par shes pa rnams dang yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro/ ma bcings ma grol ba rim tha
292b1(nyi khri): mig lnga dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro// ma bcings ma grol ba dem bcings ma grol ba'i gzugs dang nam yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro// ma bcings mtho
292b2(nyi khri): bde ma bcings ma grol ba'i ting nge 'dzin rnams dang nam yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro// ma bcings ma grol ba de ma bcings ma grol ba'i lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid
292b3(nyi khri): bsgrub par 'gyur ro// ma bcings ma grol ba'i de ma bcings ma grol ba'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro//
292b4(nyi khri): ma bcings ma grol ba de ma bcings ma grol ba'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar 'gyur ro// ma bcings ma stsol ba de mya bcings ma grol ba'i sems can rnams thes
292b5(nyi khri): pa gsum la rab tu 'god par 'gyur te/ tshe dang ldan pa gang po de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chen po ma bcings ma grol ba/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug po ma bcings ma
